Location: WeWork, Lim Tower 3, 03-101, 29A Nguyễn Đình Chiểu, Đa Kao Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh See map
Job Desription: ['We are a team of passionate software engineers, product managers, and designers that enjoy building outstanding web and mobile applications.', "Millions of people use our apps. We work for companies of all sizes; from 1-person startups to Fortune 500 enterprises. We take a collaborative and product development approach, creating custom software that people will love to use and solving our clients' problems so that they can focus on what they do best - better.", 'Working Location', 'We have 2 offices in Vietnam, you can choose whether you would like to work in Ho Chi Minh City or Da Nang', 'What you will do', 'You will be part of the development team in a project squad with the Product Owner, UIUX, and other developers.', 'Write clean, composable, and maintainable code as you develop world-class products for our clients.', 'Write automated tests to build and maintain the product we build for our clients.', 'Do code reviews with your squad members.', 'Learn new technologies, languages, and techniques so that you are able to adapt to the evolving needs of our clients.', 'Mentor junior members via pair-programming and sharing your knowledge through team rituals (sprint planning and bi-weekly retrospectives).', 'Collaborate with other team members to define the internal processes and initiatives to help the company accomplish its mission. Our handbook has been written by the whole team.']
Requirements: ['2+ years of professional Android development experience. Experience in Java or Kotlin is a must. Experience in Flutter is a big plus.', 'Experience in writing automated tests for mobile applications.', 'Enjoy working on challenging solutions and systems.', 'Believe that building great applications is not only about delivering code that “works”, but involves thinking about reusability, maintainability, security, and performance.', 'A "Can do attitude" and a product mindset.', 'Confidence in communicating in English.', 'Due to COVID-19 and international travel restriction, we are able to process candidates who are currently residing in Vietnam only. If you are living outside of Vietnam, we will get in touch with you once the travel ban is lifted.']
Benefits: ['You will be proud of any product that has our name on it.', 'We are an engineering-focused company. Both co-founders are software engineers and led the tech teams at the most prominent e-commerce powerhouses in South East Asia.', 'We really pay attention and care about processes, high quality, and aesthetics.', 'Strong processes. We not only believe but also really work following agile principles. Developers work on well-sized and well-defined user stories, do estimates using points and work iteratively in short sprints (1-2 weeks).', 'Regular one-on-one reviews to constantly improve and grow. We have a clearly defined process for our developers to level up continuously not only their technical skills but also soft skills.', 'The vast amount of learning resources (Pluralsight, Pragpub, Leanpub, (e-)books, etc.) and yearly education allowance to step up your game.', 'Private medical insurance (Liberty) from day one, company care fund, and social welfare coverage.', 'Great equipment consisting of a MacBook Pro, large screens, and any accessory to let you work comfortably. Our equipment is renewed every 3 years.', 'Casual work attire for everyone.', 'Comfortable and modern office space environment in the heart of Ho Chi Minh City and Da Nang.', 'Company-wide Work-From-Home policy', 'Work From Home allowance to set up your home office the right way!', 'Our office kitchen is fully stocked with drinks and snacks for the team.', 'Visa and work permit for foreigners. If you live abroad, we provide a relocation assistance package consisting of a plane ticket allowance and up to 3 weeks of initial accommodation.', '26 days of paid leaves/year (11 public holidays + 15 personal days).', 'Sabbatical month every 3 years.', 'Company outing every year.', 'And many more perks!']

Benefits: ['Why We Are Different?', 'At DXC Vietnam, we acknowledge that our associates are the greatest asset and we make sure to provide our talents an exciting job and work/life balance.', 'A Great Place to Work: We provide our associates a range of programs in the workplace to help maintain healthy and work life balance (Sport/Tournaments/Yoga, Music Band, etc.).', 'Various Recreation Activities: We offer our associates a great number of recreation activities through-out the year include sports, yoga practices, internal contest, etc. which greatly promote the unity and team spirit (DXC Amazing Race, DXC Got Talent, etc.)', 'Extra Healthcare & Insurance Programs: We wish to bring our associates the best for their health by offering superior benefits that support health and wellness.', 'Incentive for Learning Achievement: We encourage our associates to strive for more learning achievements with the attractive incentive programs (Technical/ English Incentive Awards, etc.)', 'Recognition Award Programs: We always acknowledge the significant contributions of our associates who constantly deliver greater value to our clients and contribute significantly to the growth of the company by the attractive recognition awards (Tech Global Award, Individual/Team Excellent Awards, etc.)', 'Tech6 Program: A frame work to foster digital technology engagements through 6 key activities that inspire, connect, educate, build, give and inform.', 'Training & Development: Our global environment promotes lifelong learning. We invest in both infrastructure and content to ensure that employees all over the world have access to high-quality learning opportunities through DXC University & extensive Training Workshops which are regularly organized weekly.', 'Overseas Transfer Program: A great number of our associates have been selected to work with our clients in the United States, Australia, United Kingdom, Dubai, Japan, Switzerland, Germany, Singapore, etc. This is really a great opportunity for our associates to fully improve their understanding and outlook of other cultures, global life style, and enabling them to develop a truly global vision and gain a rich perspective of experience life-changing insights.', 'Corporate Responsibility: Our associates make the company and our CR efforts successful. Location: 127 Hong Ha, Phu Nhuan, Ho Chi Minh See map
Job Desription: ['Autonomous is a 5-year-old company based in HCM Vietnam and the US, building tools for the new world of work. Autonomous powers 1,000,000 individuals and 130,000 businesses across the globe including Google, Netflix, Genentech, and Microsoft. ', "It's going to the end of 2021 and now is a good time to get ready for the VR gold rush to come in 2025. Autonomous aims to build an open distribution platform where creators build VR experiences and publish anywhere on any VR headset to any consumer in the world. It would be the easiest way to create VR experiences. No code needed; create it from your fingertips, together with your friends, and share it to anyone to enjoy, and earn money at the same time too.", "Starting with VR games, we're looking for talented 3D Unity Game Developers to join this project. You will get the chance to join newly teams focusing on creating and testing new games prototypes. Joining Autonomous, you will have a strong impact on the business and a unique opportunity to reach hundreds of millions of users. ", 'Check out ', 'Responsibilities', 'Develop the game logic and mechanics using C#', 'Write robust code to be used by millions of users', 'Be able to deconstruct and analyze mobile games mechanics', 'Support and contribute new ideas to game features']
Requirements: ['Requirements', '5+ years of relevant software development experience', 'Sound knowledge of OOP concepts and very good in C# programming', 'Experience in game development with advanced knowledge in Unity Engine, C# and OOP', 'Strong knowledge of Unity3D development', 'Have knowledge of networking', 'Proficient in English (Reading and Writing)', 'Bachelor Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent', 'Nice to Have', 'Knowledge of common mobile game mechanics', 'Experience in distributed version of control software SVN/GIT', 'Have knowledge of creating Android plugin for Unity3D', 'Experience in Virtual Reality project', 'Have been a part of at least 1 complete multiplayer game in Unity']
Benefits: ['Why you’ll love working here', 'You be you.  We deeply care about helping everyone at Autonomous work on what they love, freely express their ideas within the organization, and grow to to their true potential.', 'You be a better you.  Most of the time, you’ll be working on cutting edge technologies.  You’ll be constantly learning and improving your knowledge as an engineer, researcher or scientist.', 'You are your own boss.  There is very little hierarchy at Autonomous.  Decision making processes are transparent and open to vote. We welcome all different ways of thinking and trust the people we work with to do what they do best. There is no micromanagement here.', 'You the inventor.  Most of the time, you’ll find yourself working on a problem that doesn’t have a solution - yet. That’s where you come in.', 'Solve problems for the world, not just Vietnam. Most of the problems we’re solving are for the global audience of today, and of tomorrow.', 'The essentials', 'Competitive salary package', 'Open dynamic working environment with stunning colleagues', 'Light breakfasts, healthy lunches, and hearty dinners', 'Unlimited sick leave, official holidays, and at least 12 paid days off per year', 'Full medical and dental coverage for you and 50% for your family', 'Powerful laptop, monitor, standing desk, and any accessories you need to do your best work', 'Free access to a wide variety of online courses']

', 'Company Overview:', 'Grapeseed is a part of GrapeCity family of companies and is an international English curriculum company focused on delivering the best English language acquisition to students ages 4-12 years old. Location: Sailing Tower Building, District 1, Ho Chi Minh See map
Job Desription: ['Mục đích công việc:', 'Chịu trách nhiệm (i) Xử lý, làm sạch, xác minh tính toàn vẹn của dữ liệu được sử dụng để phân tích; (ii) Lựa chọn các tính năng, xây dựng và tối ưu hóa bộ phân loại bằng kỹ thuật máy học; (iii) Cải tiến các thủ tục thu thập dữ liệu bằng các thông tin liên quan/ bên thứ 3 phục vụ việc xây dựng hệ thống phân tích; (iv) Thực hiện phân tích đặc biệt và trình bày kết quả một cách rõ ràng.', 'Trách nhiệm công việc:', '• Xử lý, làm sạch, xác minh tính toàn vẹn của dữ liệu được sử dụng để phân tích;', '• Lựa chọn các tính năng, xây dựng và tối ưu hóa bộ phân loại bằng kỹ thuật máy học;', '• Cải tiến các thủ tục thu thập dữ liệu bằng các thông tin liên quan/ bên thứ 3 phục vụ việc xây dựng hệ thống phân tích;', '• Thực hiện phân tích đặc biệt và trình bày kết quả một cách rõ ràng;', '• Tham gia xây dựng tài liệu kỹ thuật cho dự án, giải pháp;', '• Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác theo phân công của cấp quản lý.']
Requirements: ['• Trình độ Cử nhân trở lên chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin, Toán Tin, Phát triển phần mềm hoặc các chuyên ngành liên quan;', '• Tối thiểu 7 năm (Chuyên gia)/5 năm (Chuyên viên cao cấp)/3 năm (Chuyên viên chính)/1 năm (Chuyên viên) kinh nghiệm làm việc trong lĩnh vực phát triển giải pháp xử lý, phân tích dữ liệu;', '• Kinh nghiệm trên các nền tảng cloud như AWS, Azure, GCP tối thiểu 1 năm;', '• Kinh nghiệm về các kỹ thuật và thuật toán học máy, chẳng hạn như k-NN, Naive Bayes, SVM, Decision Tree, Random Forests.', '• Kinh nghiệm với các mô hình học sâu (deep learning), chẳng hạn như neural network, CNN, RNN, ...', '• Có kinh nghiệm với các bộ công cụ khoa học dữ liệu phổ biến, chẳng hạn như R, Python, MatLab, …', '• Kinh nghiệm xây dựng các giải pháp tích hợp dữ liệu từ nhiều nguồn khác nhau;', '• Kinh nghiệm phát triển với một số ngôn ngữ lập trình như: Python, Java, …;', '• Kinh nghiệm xây dựng giải pháp với cơ sở dữ liệu quan hệ và không quan hệ;', '• Kinh nghiệm với các công cụ xử lý dữ liệu lớn như: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, …;', '• Tư duy phản biện và khả năng giải quyết vấn đề;', '• Kỹ năng tiếng Anh thành thạo.']
Benefits: ['Thu nhập cạnh tranh so với các đơn vị cùng ngành. VIB áp dụng Cơ chế tiền lương minh bạch, công bằng và tương xứng với mức độ đóng góp của từng cá nhân nên bạn hoàn toàn có quyền tự quyết định mức thu nhập của bản thân. Bên cạnh đó, chính sách Thưởng cuối năm theo hiệu quả làm việc và Thưởng bằng cổ phiếu cũng là một trong những cấu phần thu nhập hấp dẫn và liên tục được cải thiện.', 'Môi trường chuyên nghiệp', 'Tại VIB, bạn sẽ được làm việc trong các văn phòng khang trang với trang thiết bị, công nghệ hiện đại. Môi trường làm việc dân chủ, cùng đội ngũ lãnh đạo và đồng nghiệp tài năng, kinh nghiệm và thân thiện, nhiệt tình sẽ giúp bạn có cơ hội học hỏi, phát huy cao nhất năng lực và thế mạnh của bản thân, tạo điều kiện cho cơ hội thăng tiến và phát triển nghề nghiệp của bạn.']

Location: 384 Hoàng Diệu, District 4, Ho Chi Minh See map
Job Desription: ['Yojee is looking for a React Native Developer to join our Engineering team, to develop and maintain our mobile applications and support for the entire application lifecycle. This candidate should also appreciate the notions of their running efforts which will empower and enhance the logistic services for potentially millions of users across a wide variety of industries.', 'Duties and Responsibilities', 'Design and build advanced logistics applications for mobile apps/platforms.', 'Collaborate with cross-platform and product development teams to define interfaces and ensure feature interoperability.', 'Identify performance improvements and efficiency optimizations for implementation, build, and deployments of the technology.', 'Architect, build, and maintain our React Native applications with clean code.', 'Implement UI from specifications provided by the UX/UI team.', 'Undertake any other ad-hoc work as assigned.', 'May be required to perform other related duties as required.']
Requirements: ['Minimum Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering or its equivalent.', '2-3 years of relevant experience in mobile development.', 'Being able to write well-documented, clean JavaScript/Typescript code.', 'Familiar with modern FE development toolchain: NPM, Babel, ESLint, Flow, Jest, etc', 'An understanding of React Native best practices and a commitment to following them.', 'Familiarity with code versioning tools such as Git.', 'Good understanding of the full mobile development life cycle.', 'Able to work independently, self-directed and solutions-oriented.', 'Excellent working attitude, problem-solving, and willingness to tackle any challenges.', 'Effective written/oral communication skills and ability to communicate ideas effectively to a corporate audience and excellent interpersonal skills.', 'Proficient in English.', 'Nice to have', 'Knowledge of Ruby on Rails, Elixir, and being a polyglot is a bonus.', 'Ability to learn new technologies and APIs.']
Benefits: ['Yojee Limited (ASX: YOJ) is a cloud based (SaaS) logistics platform that seamlessly and uniquely manages, tracks and optimises freight movements along the entire logistics chain, from sender to end customer, across borders and between logistics providers (land, sea, air), with subcontractors and for multi-leg journeys. Yojee ensures connectivity and more efficient planning along the entire journey.', "We are not a startup although the company structure is organized in such a way. Our clients' partnership with Silicon Stack is an investment in our creditability and track record in delivering quality solutions that are user friendly.", 'Our passion is to bring to life the ideas and aspirations of our customers through innovation.']

Location: Diamond Flower building, 48 Le Van Luong, Nhan Chinh, Thanh Xuan, Ha Noi See map
Job Desription: ['Position Overview', 'We are looking for a highly motivated and passionate DevOps Engineer for the TIBCO Data Virtualization (TDV) Product. The successful candidate will own and manage our CI/CD system for TDV releases. This CI/CD system manages the following TDV distributions: Hotfix, Patch, Installer, Docker, and Kubernetes. The TDV Product is mainly implemented in Java and is a multi-million line source base. The product is mature and has been in production for more than a decade so this role requires a detail oriented approach to keeping our CI/CD system running well.', 'Responsibilities', 'Review, design, and implement dev/qa/release requirements for updating and/or creating new features in our CI/CD system for our TIBCO Data Virtualization Product (i.e. TDV Server, TDV Business Directory, TDV Studio, and TDV Driver components).', 'Manage the CI/CD systems and their respective software platforms regarding security updates.', 'Provide technical support to the dev/qa/release teams that use the CI/CD system for hotfix and GA releases.', 'Maintain updated knowledge of industry trends and advancements in CI/CD and DevOps.', 'Assist release team with automation efforts around static & dynamic security scans of builds.', 'Assist release team with automation efforts around software composition analysis scans of source code for third party vulnerabilities.']
Requirements: ['Bachelors or Master’s Degree in Computer Science or related technical field.', 'Ability to quickly pick up new technologies, excellent communication skills(oral/written), excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.', 'Collaborate within the team and across teams. Flexible in adapting to different situations, self-driven and taking initiatives in accomplishing team’s goals.', 'Good understanding of high level software development life cycle.', 'Proficient in at least one programming/scripting language – e.g. Python, Groovy, Powershell, bash/sh shell.', 'Proficient in both Windows and Linux OS Platforms.', 'Proficient with at least one CI/CD tool - e.g. Jenkins/Teamcity/etc. Jenkins preferred.', 'Proficient with GIT and comfortable working with a GitOps mindset.', 'Experience using an artifact repository (i.e. Artifactory, Nexus, Harbor).', 'Familiarity with bug tracking software - e.g. JIRA, Bugzilla.', 'Familiarity with Docker image creation and deployment of containers.', 'Must be familiar with basic security concepts or standards as appropriate for this position.', 'Desired Skills', 'Experience with any Kubernetes deployments on bare metal or one public cloud (AWS/Azure/GCP).', 'Experience with Helm and Kubectl.', 'Experience with Ansible and Ansible Tower.', 'Experience with security scanning tools (i.e. SonarCube, Tenable SC, Tenable IO).', 'Familiarity with AIX PowerPC platform.', 'Familiarity with basic RDBMS and SQL Language.', 'Familiarity with other development infrastructure tools – JIRA and Confluence.']
Benefits: ['1. Focus on YOU - Health and Wellbeing : ', 'Flexible working options and genuine work/life balance.', 'Employee Assistance Programme  ', '23 paid leaves per year (18 days annual paid leaves + 5 sick leaves);', 'Premium PTI private health & 24/7 personal accident insurance insurance for you and your family members; ', 'Social & Medical insurances in line with Vietnamese Labor Law;', 'Annual Health check-up;', '2. Location: Floor 3, 101-103-105-107 Nguyen Thi Minh Khai, Ben Thanh Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh See map
Job Desription: ['We are a startup with BIG dreams - revolutionize the way businesses collaborate to build next-generation customer engagement platforms, creating exceptional values for users and businesses together.', 'Our coalition loyalty platform enables consumers to earn rewards conveniently and joyfully by interacting with the brands of their choices across a nationwide merchant network that today reaches 30% of the Vietnamese consumers. We aim to redefine the omnichannel shopping experience and set the standards on how brands should engage their customers by leveraging data to drive consumer insights, marketing efficiency, and product personalization.', 'TAPTAP is a trademark of VUI Vietnam, which is a Joint Venture company that is owned by Vietnam Investments Group (VIG) and United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB). VIG is a leading private equity firm in Vietnam with total funds under management of over USD 500 million and with stakes in over 35 brands in the market. UOB is a leading bank in Asia, headquartered in Singapore, with a global network of over 500 offices including Vietnam.', 'WHAT YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:', 'Participate in reviewing and analyzing the project requirement to understand test objectives, provide input on the testability of requirements and estimation for the testing activities.', 'Participate in product meetings to ensure that engagement work products and deliverables are of the highest quality.', 'Develop the test plan, test strategy.', 'Assist in the planning, creation, and control of the test environment(s).', 'Develop manual test cases and prioritize testing activities.', 'Execute all the manual test cases, performance tests, and report defects, define severity and priority for each defect.', 'Prepare the reports related to software testing carried out.', 'Ensure that all test-related work is carried out as per the defined standards and procedures.', 'Transfer knowledge, monitor engagement team performance, and provide feedback on the team.']
Requirements: ['Have at least 3+ years of experience with software testing.', 'Good software testing knowledge and automation test methods.', 'Attention to detail.', 'Analytical mind and strong problem-solving.', 'Able to develop a proactive and good working relationship with other team members.', 'Good knowledge of automation tests, performance tests, and security tests.', 'Understanding of HTTP, RESTful data structures, and JSON format.', 'Good product mindset, communication, and English skills.', 'YOU WILL HAVE THE FOLLOWING SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:', 'Bachelor/Master Computer Science / Development degree and other related fields.', 'Experience in Agile/Scrum.', 'API testing.']
Benefits: ['Part of a pioneer team of a digital start-up with huge growth opportunity and strong backing from two organizations', '13th month salary and performance bonus', '15 annual leaves', '100% Social Insurance', 'Private healthcare insurance, yearly checkup', 'Training sessions', 'Gathering activities in special occasions (Christmas, New Year, Women’s Day, etc.)', 'Company trip and team building activities', 'Snacks, tea and coffee are ready to serve', 'A flexible environment with super fun and enthusiastic colleagues']

Location: 7th floor, Fafilm Building, 6 Thai Van Lung, Ben Nghe, District 1, District 1, Ho Chi Minh See map
Job Desription: ['Epsilo is an e-commerce SaaS startup that helps drive effective marketing spend onto horizontal marketplaces like Shopee, Lazada, Tokopedia. And for more mission to come, we are looking for Frontend talents to join our tech-hub in Ho Chi Minh and Da Nang (our brand new hub). This is an amazing opportunity to gain self-leadership, your ownership and to work at a robust start-up as Epsilo.', 'About the QA Engineer role', "More than the act of testing, the act of designing tests is one of the best bug preventers known. In Epsilo, we respect the thinking that must be done to create a useful test that can discover and eliminate bugs before they are coded. We're looking for a tester with test-design thinking who can discover and eliminate bugs at every stage in the creation of software, from conception to specification, to design, coding, and the rest.", 'Responsibilities', 'Review requirements, specifications, and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback.', 'Create detailed, comprehensive, and well-structured test plans, test cases, and test reports.', 'Estimate, prioritize, plan and coordinate testing activities.', 'Identify, record, document thoroughly, and track bugs.', 'Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved.', 'Develop and apply testing processes for new and existing products.']
Requirements: ['Requirements:', 'Two or more years of relevant work experience.', 'Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools, and processes.', 'Experience in writing clear, concise, and comprehensive test plans and test cases.', 'Hands-on experience with both white box and black box testing.', 'Familiarity with programming script languages such as Java or Javascript is a plus.', 'Excellent analytical skills.', 'Good written and verbal communication skills.', 'Strong attention to detail.', 'Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process.']
Benefits: ['Life at Epsilo', 'Day-do-day work with diversified remote team', 'Work-from-Anywhere policy', 'Health insurance coverage', 'Others: Laptop, T-Shirts, handbook, welcome kit', 'Working hour at Epsilo', 'Mon - Fri', '9h00 - 18h30, and break time 1h30']

Location: 7th floor, Fafilm Building, 6 Thai Van Lung, Ben Nghe, District 1, District 1, Ho Chi Minh See map
Job Desription: ['Epsilo is an e-commerce SaaS startup that helps drive effective marketing spend onto horizontal marketplaces like Shopee, Lazada, Tokopedia. And for more mission to come, we are looking for Frontend talents to join our tech-hub in Ho Chi Minh and Da Nang (our brand new hub). This is an amazing opportunity to gain self-leadership, your ownership and to work at a robust start-up as Epsilo.', 'About the role', 'Team mission', 'Epsilo, a #performancemarketing platform built specifically on top of #ecommerce platforms and designed for the needs of companies selling and marketing goods at scale on platforms including general merchandising marketplaces (Lazada, Shopee and Tokopedia), social commerce (TikTok, Instagram, Facebook), vertical commerce (Grab, Go-jek), conversational commerce (WhatsApp)', 'Marketing hundreds of products, thousands of keywords on over 5 platforms and fulfilling orders across 6 markets can be a daunting and painful process. This team makes mass selling and marketing simple. Clients can unify campaigns, simplify operation and grow #GMV across platforms and countries.', 'Your mission will be one of the below', "(1) The engineers in this squad will need to collaborate with platform tribe, whose mission is to secure API-integrate with marketplaces, to design, implement and scale back-end and front-end technology standards & framework that help Epsilo's client operate & optimize marketing activities on multiple types of marketplaces seamlessly and independently right on Epsilo. They also work closely with the product manager and the UX to design a mass and closed-loop marketing optimization flow based on PDCA approach. To get to such promised land, you need to be tough, decisive, entrepreneurial, self-motivational to get over all the challenges along the way. This mission is unique.", '(2) Ensure the availability, integrity and confidentiality of the API integration with up to 72 marketplaces in 42 countries. We want to build and maintain an SLA of 99% API uptime with marketplaces regardless of API type including seller center, onsite marketplace and other advertising platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, TikTok. They may need to develop a monitoring and auditing system, recovery automation as well as prevention system.', 'What you will be responsible for', 'You need to identify problem, design solution, plan, phase the implementation', "Collaborating across stakeholders such as data scientists, engineers, and squad leaders to deliver technical solutions that solve customers' problems", 'Writing code, unit tests, and technical document', 'Participating in system design to maintain our high development standards', 'Participating in interview loops to help hire the best engineers in the industry', 'Jumping the extra mile to identify customer needs and pain-points']
Requirements: ['We are looking at bar-raising engineers who have', 'From 3 years of hands-on engineering experience', 'Strong experience with at least one of the following languages is required: PHP, Golang, Python, Typescript', 'Strong knowledge in fundamentals: data structures, algorithms, OOP, and design pattern', 'Hands-on experiences in building high-performing and scalable systems', 'Have made tough technical decisions based on requirements, trade-offs, and user experience', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills; sharp analytical abilities with proven design skills; ability to think critically about growth and stability', 'Experience in enterprise software-as-a-service is an advantage but not a must']
Benefits: ['Life at Epsilo', 'Day-do-day work with diversified remote team', 'Work-from-Anywhere policy', 'Health insurance coverage', 'Others: Laptop, T-Shirts, handbook, welcome kit', 'Working hour at Epsilo', 'Mon - Fri', '9h00 - 18h30, and break time 1h30']

Job Desription: ['We’re looking for a frontend tech lead who has a background building modern web applications with a focus on user experience to lead our frontend team. Frontend engineers at Diag are involved in the product design and development process with a focus on building Javascript applications with HTML and CSS.', 'A typical week for a frontend engineer includes: collaborating on the product plan, working closely with product and design to incorporate customer feedback into changes and features, and writing code in a continuous deployment environment to quickly get changes in front of real people.', '', 'You will work in Vue.js with SCSS and RESTful APIs, along with related libraries, including data visualizations such as D3 and Victory, and testing frameworks such as Jest and Cypress.', ' About DIAG:', 'DIAG is transforming from a diagnostic laboratory into a software driven integrated healthcare solutions provider to doctors, clinics, corporations and consumers. You will be part of this transformation, putting technology at the heart of our business to support rapid growth. You will be building complex healthcare solutions to deliver user-focused technology-driven experiences for healthcare organisations, professionals and patients.', ' Within your first two weeks at Diag, you will:', 'Introduce yourself to the various teams across the company, to learn what they do and share your experience with them.', 'Learn about the product roadmaps and the exciting challenges we will face.', 'Get your first features developed and deployed to our internal and external customers, learning about our development process, products, and codebase along the way.', 'Within a quarter, you will:', 'Own technical decisions for the frontend architecture, with a focus on clean and reusable code and design components.', 'Grow the frontend team by hiring and mentoring world-class engineers.', 'Deliver value to our customers by owning impactful features from end to end.', 'Lead our FE Squad and push consistency and best practices across different products', 'Within a year, you will:', 'Build world-class healthcare products improving the lives of patients.', 'Grow a frontend team that is continually innovating and improving at quickly developing high quality solutions for customers needs.', 'Be the authority on all things frontend at Diag.']
Requirements: ['Good proficiency in English ', '5+ years of related experience in Javascript/Vuejs, Webpack', 'Product Engineering" mindset.', 'Pragmatism and obsession for simplicity, efficiency, and performance.', 'Obsession for quality and testing.', 'Strong communication skills.', ' Diag might be the opportunity you’re looking for ', 'If you’re interested in changing HealthCare industry in Vietnam building software which improves people’s life.', 'If you’re hungry to give and receive feedback, fully understanding that challenging perspectives are the only way that you can grow. ', 'If you can bring empathy to problem solving. ', "If this sounds interesting but you’re not sure you'll tick all the boxes, apply anyway! There’s tons of room to grow at Diag."]

Job Desription: ['Vị trí này thuộc Chương trình tuyển dụng D-Innovation của Ngân hàng TMCP Hàng Hải Việt Nam (MSB). Đây là chương trình tuyển dụng mảng Công nghệ thông tin và Khoa học máy tính lớn nhất của MSB từ trước tới nay. Mục tiêu cao nhất của Chương trình là nhằm tìm kiếm và tạo cơ hội thể hiện năng lực cho các Kỹ sư Công nghệ có kinh nghiệm, từ đó triển khai thành công các Siêu dự án trong tổ hợp công nghệ cao của MSB (gồm các dự án Công nghệ lớn/nhỏ và Khối Công nghệ MSB).', 'Tham gia vào quá trình thiết kế tổng thể Cơ sở Hạ tầng Đám mây và hệ thống DevOps', 'Thiết kế, triển khai và vận hành cơ sở hạ tầng DevOps cho đội ngũ Phát triển và Vận hành', 'Thiết kế, triển khai và tối ưu hóa quá trình bàn giao sản phẩm từ khâu lập trình & kiểm thử đến khâu triển khai cho khách hàng (production)', 'Tham gia phân tích và tích hợp bảo mật trong quá trình bàn giao', 'Tham gia xử lý sự cố và sửa lỗi trong quá trình phát triển, triển khai và vận hành', 'Tạo tài liệu mô tả dự án và cơ sở kiến thức cho các hoạt động DevOps']
Requirements: [' ·     Có từ 3 năm kinh nghiệm trở lên trong lĩnh vực công nghệ (ưu tiên ứng viên từng làm việc với cơ sở hạ tầng của AWS)', '·     Có hiểu biết tốt về các giải pháp & luồng công việc của SDLC và DevOps', '·     Có kinh nghiệm thiết kế & triển khai kiến trúc có thể đáp ứng được các yêu cầu về thời gian khả dụng và độ tin cậy bằng cách tuân thủ các thông lệ tốt nhất của AWS và trong ngành', '·     Có kinh nghiệm dịch chuyển dữ liệu lưu trữ tại chỗ (on-premise) sang nền tảng điện toán đám mây (cloud) là một lợi thế lớn', '·     Có kinh nghiệm lâu năm về dịch vụ DevOPs của AWS và/hoặc các giải pháp tiêu chuẩn trên thị trường như Jira, Confluence, CodeCommit, GitHub, Gitlab, CodePipeline, CodeBuild, Jenkins,  CodeDeploy, ELK stack, Prometheus + Grafana, ….', '·     Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng dịch vụ AWS để phát triển website/ứng dụng điện thoại là một lợi thế', '·     Ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm làm việc trong mảng triển khai vận hành ngân hàng']
Benefits: ['Tham gia những siêu dự án với vốn đầu tư 2000 tỉ đồng, ứng dụng những công nghệ mới nhất.', 'Được dẫn dắt bởi đội ngũ quản lý giỏi chuyên môn, đánh giá công bằng. Location: Tòa nhà TNR, 54A Nguyễn Chí Thanh, Dong Da, Ha Noi See map
Job Desription: ['Vị trí này thuộc Chương trình tuyển dụng D-Innovation của Ngân hàng TMCP Hàng Hải Việt Nam. Đây là chương trình tuyển dụng mảng Công nghệ thông tin và Khoa học máy tính lớn nhất của MSB từ trước tới nay. Mục tiêu cao nhất của Chương trình là nhằm tìm kiếm và tạo cơ hội thể hiện năng lực cho các Kỹ sư Công nghệ có kinh nghiệm, từ đó triển khai thành công các Siêu dự án trong tổ hợp công nghệ cao của MSB (gồm các dự án Công nghệ lớn/nhỏ và Khối Công nghệ MSB).', 'Tham gia vào quá trình thiết kế tổng thể Cơ sở Hạ tầng Đám mây và hệ thống DevOps', 'Làm việc với người dùng từ đơn vị kinh doanh/nghiệp vụ và quản lý để đưa ra các giải pháp kỹ thuật; đánh giá rủi ro kỹ thuật và bảo mật và vạch ra chiến lược giảm thiểu thiệt hại', 'Làm việc chặt chẽ với Kiến trúc sư doanh nghiệp để đáp ứng các tiêu chuẩn phát triển nội bộ', 'Nghiên cứu, phân tích và đánh giá công nghệ & giải pháp để đáp ứng các yêu cầu kinh doanh', 'Thiết kế quy trình phát triển và quy trình làm việc để hoạt động thống nhất với DevOps; thiết kế và tối ưu hóa ứng dụng và kiến trúc cơ sở hạ tầng để đáp ứng các yêu cầu về chức năng, độ tin cậy và thời gian khả dụng', 'Cung cấp kiến thức về các hệ thống liên quan đến sản phẩm Hành trình khách hàng và trực tiếp thay đổi mã nguồn, tích hợp các tính năng/mô-đun mới vào hệ thống hiện tại khi cần thiết', 'Phối hợp với Chuyên viên phân tích nghiệp vụ, thực hiện kiểm thử UAT, ORT và giải quyết các vấn đề liên quan đến code và tích hợp']

Location: Tầng 10, Toàn Nhà Five Star Tower, 28 Bis Mạc Đĩnh Chi, Phường Đa Kao, District 1, Ho Chi Minh See map
Job Desription: ['◆What are you doing', 'The Pascalia Group is an IT company with offices in Tokyo, Tsukuba, Ho Chi Minh, Hai Phong and Da Nang.', 'We are in charge of a wide range of businesses such as Client work business, IT / Consulting business, Infrastructure business, Data Analysis business, In-house web service business, and Offshore Development business in a wide variety of industries.', 'Pascalia is celebrating its 33rd year in business, which is said to be a long-established store in Japan IT industry, and has a corporate culture that emphasizes corporate culture and humanity rather than following only profits and productivity.', 'From the French philosopher, who is Pascal\'s word "human beings are reeds to think", which is also the origin of the company name Pascalia, "a place for learning and growth" is more important corporate culture.', 'The organization has strong unity, such as recruiting new graduates, which has been continuing since the company was founded on 1988, and a culture of mutual support has been established, such as reviewing programming with Vietnamese people. It is a strength.', 'Pascalia Asia Japan and Pascalia Asia Vietnam are a growing global startup with sales of 3 million USD in less than 5 years.', 'We are a small group of elite people who utilize their individual abilities, and our strength is our technical ability to provide consistent services such as "Development to Operation" and "Upper phase to Lower phase", with a focus on direct contracts with end users unlike a subcontractor.', 'We offer a wide range of free career paths that are not tied to limited domain knowledge or technology.', ' We are also focusing on skill development, and we provide a wide range of support from inside and outside the company, such as a mentor support system by engineer specialists, Filipino English conversation training, and career counseling.', 'By dividing each career path into multiple types, we clarify the direction that employees are aiming for, and align their awareness with engineers through "places of learning and growth" and "coaching" that support them.', 'Here are some examples of career paths and types.', '◆ "Engineer Specialist" This model is suitable for specialists who are drawing a career path specializing in technology.', '・ F type: Join as an engineering manager for difficult development projects such as renewal and SaaS. Responsible for a wide range of work from basic design and code review to engineer team management.', '・ T type: Leads the renewal of a famous service that has transactions with annual sales of several hundred million yen. Responsible for a wide range of technical research, verification, proposals, and implementation, such as server less architecture design and cooperation with other systems.', ' In addition, the Pascalia Group has set the purpose of existence to create new value in society.', 'Our strength is to work on new businesses in a stable environment, such as infrastructure business using spacon, financial data analysis, hybrid model by global development team, AI research and development, development and operation project of new WEB business.', 'We have also introduced coaching by outside experts to eliminate the psychological anxiety of employees and try to get excited every morning to work.', ' [Example of In-house service]', 'Goodeal:', 'Cashback service for Vietnamese market.', 'E-commerce transactions are increasing in Vietnam, aiming for 10 million users.', '  Pascalia Asia', ' ']

Location: Diamond Flower building, 48 Le Van Luong, Nhan Chinh, Thanh Xuan, Ha Noi See map
Job Desription: ['Company Overview', 'TIBCO Software Inc. unlocks the potential of real-time data for making faster, smarter decisions. Our Connected Intelligence Platform seamlessly connects any application or data source; intelligently unifies data for greater access, trust, and control; and confidently predicts outcomes in real time and at scale. Learn how solutions to our customers’ most critical business challenges are made possible by TIBCO at .', 'Context', 'Our Master Data Management software - TIBCO EBX is positioned by Gartner in both its Magic Quadrants for Master Data Management (MDM) with one single software solution and was ranked #1 MDM technology six years in a row by The Information Difference.', 'Our core data management software is developed by our product engineering group in Paris, France. Since 2011, we have set up technical operations in Hanoi to provide test, support and development resources to complement the work of our engineering group.', 'You will join our subsidiary in Hanoi, Vietnam to reinforce the delivery process between our local resources and our product engineer group in Paris. Our Hanoi subsidiary will work as a part of TIBCO product engineering group to develop and test additional software components.']
Requirements: ['We are looking for a Business Analyst to reinforce our ability to establish the functional specification of our software in data management. You will work in coordination with the BA team in Paris and our local partner’s java developers located in Hanoi. You will have the opportunity to experience projects on various innovative domains for international clients (master data, data quality, data analytics, mobile data, big data). You will work with talented and recognized experts in data management.', 'Who You Are', 'Bachelor or Engineer’s degree in Computer Sciences or related fields;', 'At least 3-5 years of experience in BA role and/or delivering Java software and architecture;', 'Good command of English;', 'Detail oriented, analytical and inquisitive', 'Ability to work independently and with others', 'Extremely organized with strong time-management skills', 'Good understanding on following technical landscape:', '- Web-based solutions', '- Agile (Scrum) and V-Cycle software engineering process', '- Good communication skill with ability to collaborate with both on-site and overseas colleagues; ']
Benefits: ['1. Focus on YOU - Health and Wellbeing : ', 'Flexible working options and genuine work/life balance.', 'Employee Assistance Programme  ', '23 paid leaves per year (18 days annual paid leaves + 5 sick leaves);', 'Premium PTI private health & 24/7 personal accident insurance insurance for you and your family members; ', 'Social & Medical insurances in line with Vietnamese Labor Law;', 'Annual Health check-up;', '2. Focus on FINANCES - Financial Future : We understand that  financial security is key. You will have income protection (Competitive salary range with 13th-month pay and annual bonus based on work performance & achievements); and death and disability insurances to provide you with financial peace-of-mind. ', '3. Focus on PROGRESSION – Learn and Advance : ', 'Take advantage of TIBCO’s Career Mapping to enhance and develop your skills to take your career in the right direction.', 'Continuous on-the-job training, peer-to-peer learning and unlimited access to online training platforms: Udemy, Tibco Academy, etc', 'Opportunities to work on world-class, innovative products and cutting-edge technologies;', 'Possibility to build up and grow your career path within the company;', '4. Focus on COMMUNITY – Collaboration and Inclusion : We strive to create a truly diverse, inclusive and collaborative community where we seek out inspiration, innovation and genuine WOW moments. From inspiring key-note speakers, mental health awareness, and culture recognition days, we offer you a truly diverse environment where your voice matters. ', 'All offers of employment are made contingent upon the successful completion of a background check. The company is the sole determinant of a successful background check.  ']

Job Desription: ['We are looking for junior/middle/senior Python developers to join our Python team in Vietnam Office, HCMC', 'Who We Are:', 'We are a team of talented developers, architects, managers, engineers, designers, DevOps-engineers, and QA-engineers using brand new tech to solve non-trivial tasks. Location: Intracom Building, 82 Dich Vong Hau , Cau Giay, Ha Noi See map
Job Desription: ['About Pentalog:', 'As a leading European Software Services company operating internationally in France, Romania, Germany, Poland, Moldova, UK, Vietnam, Mexico, and the USA, we employ over 1,300 engineers and IT experts who work in a very dynamic, multicultural working environment.', 'At Pentalog, your talents & ambitions are recognized and rewarded; we offer plenty of opportunities to develop as an individual, as well as a professional, and we reward our collaborators who understand the importance of self-improvement.', 'About the project:', 'How we hire:', "At Pentalog, excellence is what you'll do. We're guided by a mission to positively impact the software development world.", 'Recommend yourself for a job', 'Join Pentalog until January 31st for a fresh start and a well-deserved self-recommendation bonus in 2022.', ' ', 'More about the project:', 'We’re looking for a skillful Java Developer who will support our client in the development of new software applications from concept to finish, with regular tests and maintenance, while also recommending solutions for improvements.', 'The position is open for a top provider of supply chain compliance solutions that help more than 15,000 brands, retailers, and importers to secure, manage and optimize their global network of goods.', 'With the help of a SaaS platform intended for quality control companies, our client offers smart solutions to make products that consumers can trust. This benchmark player – the first of its kind in this sector – is using on-the-ground experts to provide services such as quality inspections, supplier audits, certification, and lab testing.']
Requirements: ['More than 3 years of experience in Java (Java 11) and Spring;', 'Knowledge of developing algorithms and web services;', 'Deep knowledge of software architecture;', 'Experience with RESTful API integration on the backside;', 'Familiarity with Continuous Integration or willingness to get into Test Driven Development;', 'Experience in cloud development will make onboarding easier: Google Cloud Platform, Amazon Web Services, Azure, or other;', 'Understanding of Agile/ SCRUM principles;', 'Good logical thinking & problem-solving skills;', 'Good at English; ', 'French is an advantage. ', 'Responsibilities:', 'Take charge of designing, developing, delivering, and maintaining the client’s SaaS platform;', 'Create and deploy elegant, scalable, and functionally rich web/mobile applications;', 'Collaborate with the Product Management and UX/UI Design team to understand the functional and technical needs of clients;', 'Develop high-performance, fault-tolerant systems that can withstand peak loads;', 'Develop standardized and documented APIs: REST FTW.;', 'Participate in the creation of web / mobile applications PWA: offline, mobile-first;', 'Analyze metrics to provide system status visibility;', 'Automate the deployment processes and take responsibility for maintaining the platform in operational conditions (the client has built a healthy and growing DevOps culture).']
Benefits: ['- Development of your career within an international company;', '- Opportunity to be trained and work in Europe & Asia;', '- The chance to learn and get training on trending technologies/ frameworks from professional teams;', '- Paid annual leave: 15 vacation days', '- Attractive salary and bonuses (including annual bonus + Tet bonus);', '- Social/ Medical Insurance in accordance with Vietnamese Laws;', '- Attractive GINET healthcare in addition to basic insurances regulated by the Labor Code;', '- Free English and French language courses held at the company;', '-Summer Holiday, Noel party: Annual; Team building: quarterly;', '- Activities: company events, parties, football club, game club, ping pong club, dancing club, etc.;', '- Relaxation with all-day, free tea & coffee;', '- Working schedule – 8h/day (from Monday until Friday).']

Location: Tầng 5, 222 Điện Biên Phủ, Phường Võ Thị Sáu, Quận 3, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, District 3, Ho Chi Minh See map
Job Desription: ['Summary: ', 'Our client is a multinational big data analytics company. They offer a Customer Data Platform (CDP) that unifies customer data from disparate sources to deliver a holistic view of the customer enabling insights and actions with the objective of optimizing personalized customer journeys. They have differentiated technologies to ingest and unify customer data, perform machine learning on customer data and syndicate with other software products for activation. They have numerous large global customers, like Subaru, Panasonic, LG and Canon who trust them to handle their complexity, scale, and security needs.', 'Our Vietnam team has around 15+ engineers who are software engineers, quality engineers and product managers. We are taking care multiple parts of the platform.', 'About the position:  ', 'As an Automation QA, on a day-to-day basis, you will work within an organization of close-knit Engineers and Managers that are incredibly technical, agile, data-driven, and highly collaborative.', 'You will write test plans that cover the product functionalities at the user level and execute them, either manually or with the aid of automated tools. You will use white box testing techniques and are able to understand software internals, debug problems. A portion of your time will be used to build automated regression test suites.', 'You will work with our Software Engineers, Product Managers, and Customer Support to understand customer usage models and develop test plans that approximate real-world product usage. You will maintain regression tests to ensure quality standards over time. You will also be responsible for driving the software development process towards quality-centric methodologies. You have a knack for figuring out a root cause and also an ability to work harmoniously with developers to communicate issues and deploy fixes.', 'Thing you will do: ', 'Transforming requirements in Test plans covering smoke, sanity, regression, databases, integration and acceptance testing.', 'Functional testing in charge of defining and driving the creation of a manual and/or automated QA process.', 'Work with the Product team in gathering product specifications (PRD).', 'Collaborate closely with the Engineering team to gather testing requirements. ', 'Develop test data, perform test data analysis and prepare reports of test results internally, using JIRA, along with detailed and easy-to-understand bug reporting.', 'Assist with the creation of software product documentation and verify its ease of use.', 'Develop automated regression test suites.']
Requirements: ['Your experience and skills will include: ', '5 years in a software testing or software development role.', '3 years of automation experience in the testing of API, big data complex queries using Hive and Presto.', 'Hand on experience with Python or Java.', 'Ability to work in a fast-paced agile environment with minimal processes, limited guidance, and focused on productivity.', 'Ability to triage issues and multitask on multiple projects. Working closely with development and business teams to communicate problem impacts and to understand the business requirements.', 'Showing creativity and initiative to improve product test coverage and effectiveness', 'Excellent communication and reporting skills.', 'Good attitude towards collaboration, helpfulness, and problem solving.', 'Experience with web services, in particular REST API testing using an automated framework.', 'Strong SQL experience including complex query design, and experience working with Big Data.', 'We would be thrilled if you: ', 'A CQE Certification', 'Experience with Hadoop technology stacks with hands-on experience running complex queries.', '3+ years of leadership role.', 'Familiarity with other Testing/QA automation tools for performance, load, stability, data quality, so you can lead the way with these tests.']
Benefits: ['What You Get', 'Competitive salary and benefits: we seek the best talent for this role as you will be the interface between product and engineering.', 'Innovation: Our business is at the frontier of enterprise technology adoption. You have an opportunity to learn about a whole suite of technology that is changing how the world’s largest institutions run their core businesses.', 'What We Value', 'Humility: Know what you do not know, be candid about it, seek help and guidance -- both from customers and colleagues.', 'Gumption: Some call it “distance travelled”, i.e., how far you have come in your life overcoming obstacles, putting in sustained effort, defying the odds. We love optimistic doers.', 'High cognitive skills & adaptive learning skills: We value people who can learn actively from the environment and constantly tweak their approach. Success comes from million such tweaks.', 'Technical breadth and depth: You will not program actively for this role.  However, you do have to develop a strong technical understanding of our platform and adjacent products.']

Company Name: ONE Tech Stop Vietnam Company Ltd
Location: Tầng 3-4 tòa nhà Phi Long, 52 Nguyễn Văn Linh, Hai Chau, Da Nang See map
Job Desription: ['JOB PURPOSE', 'The quality gatekeeper, responsible for ensuring that software is being delivered with the highest quality standards. The main mission is to reach quality excellence by having no issues in production as a continuous target.', 'The QA Engineer should know and understand the business details, being able to check whether the final result matches all the business expectations.', 'The QA Engineer should create and execute manual and automated test scenarios, provide root cause analyses of defects based on metrics and proactively raise improvements that will enhance the quality of the product.', 'PRIMARY JOB RESPONSIBILITIES', 'As a member of an Agile team: The main responsibility for the quality of the product. Ensure that the product is delivered with the highest quality by leveraging QA activities along with the scrum phases. Some of the daily basis activities are:', 'Learning the product business and targets', 'Creating and executing Test case documents.', 'Creating and executing test automation scripts (UI testing, API testing, etc).', 'Ensure that the bugs are being properly registered and the root cause is being correctly set.', 'Providing insights to the development team and stakeholders by making quality data visible through quality reports.', 'Proposing actions that will improve the quality of the product.', 'Leading demonstration meetings with the stakeholders.']
Requirements: ['SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field.', 'Good communication skills in English.', 'Sharp attention to detail and strong analytical and problem-solving skills.', 'Knowledge of quality assurance terminology, methods, and tools.', 'Demonstrated knowledge of testing best practices, version control practices, and defect management practices.', 'Understanding of Agile/Scrum methodology and how QA functions within it.', 'PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS', 'Experience with test automation tools, such as Selenium, Gherkin, Specflow, Postman, SoapUI, etc.', 'Familiarity with git and version control tools.', 'Professional certification in the Quality Assurance field.']
Benefits: ['At OTSV, work is a self-fulfilment, we encourage staff to leave their comfort zone, think out of the box, and share their ideas without hesitation. As a team, we analyse and evaluate issues objectively to learn quickly from mistakes.', 'We believe in ‘fail quick, success quick’ and strive to keep pace with the forefront of technology to digitize ONE’s business.', 'The designs of our offices embrace our culture of being flexible and open. Unlike a conventional office, we have an open concept with different work areas which encourages collaboration, open-mindedness and spontaneity.', 'Each work area has its own charm and aims to make our staff feel as comfortable in the office as they would feel at home. Job Desription: ['As a Quality Control Engineer you will be responsible for developing automated testing frameworks, identifying and analyzing defects, producing test scripts, carrying out regression testing, and documenting findings in AI products.', '- Identifying, analyzing and evaluating technology deficiencies in developing systems including client software, backend and data management systems.', '- Preparing, updating and maintaining relevant test documentation, including test scripts, diagrams and examples where appropriate in accordance with testing procedures and quality accredited standards', '- Testing, identifying and coordinating re-test of deficiencies and issues via JIRA as workflow actions.', '- Perform software validation, completing the test script and documenting the evidence of testing to ensure the software is acceptable as per specifications', '- Undertaking automated testing where applicable using automated test software applications to test the system and software, and documenting the test results in related reports and documentation.', '- Assisting other team members and business resources as appropriate to the implementation of testing related activities.', '- Collaborating with other business users to create and update relevant documentation', '- Carrying out other tasks as agreed with the Manager.']

Location: WeWork, Lim Tower 3, 03-101, 29A Nguyễn Đình Chiểu, Đa Kao Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh See map
Job Desription: ['We are a team of passionate software engineers, product managers, and designers that enjoy building outstanding web and mobile applications.', "Millions of people use our apps. We work for companies of all sizes; from 1-person startups to Fortune 500 enterprises. We take a collaborative and product development approach, creating custom software that people will love to use and solving our clients' problems so that they can focus on what they do best - better.", 'Working location', 'We have 2 offices in Vietnam, you can choose whether you would like to work in Ho Chi Minh City or Da Nang', 'What you will do', 'Oversee and ensure the delivery of our projects:', "It's a hands-on role so we expect you do code reviews with your squad members.", 'While full-time development is not part of the role, we expect and encourage you to take part in the development activities of your choosing to keep your skills in great shape.', 'Collaborate closely with the Product Manager and Team Leads to make sure our projects are delivered efficiently following our best practices.', 'Work closely with our Product Managers to guide our clients in their product development journey.', 'Nurture and assess developers assigned to you:', 'Instigate curiosity and continuous learning in the area you are an expert in.', 'Perform regular one-on-ones and performance reviews with your direct reports.', 'Participate in our recruitment process:', 'Be part of the screening and assessment of candidates.', 'Collaborate closely with our Talent Team to improve our recruitment processes.', 'Provide insights to and collaborate closely with the CTO to:', 'Improve the engineering skills of the team.', 'Coordinate activities between all engineering areas.', 'What challenges you will have', 'Given our growth, this is the first time we are hiring for such role. So you will be given autonomy and real possibilities to support our company to grow.', 'Maintain your technical expertise by being involved in development activities. The Technical Lead role remains a 100% software engineering role with some management responsibilities. The role comes with reduced development activities but it\'s still an active "coding" role.', 'Our team is composed of Thai and foreign nationals (> 8 nationalities). So you will have the opportunity to manage developers coming from various backgrounds, cultures, and countries.', 'There is a lot of room for you to learn and grow in this role. We are open to new initiatives and processes to improve the way we operate.']
Requirements: ['5 years or more of professional web development experience. Experience in Ruby, Elixir, JavaScript (Node.JS) or Go is preferred. If you have advanced experience in PHP or Python and want to step up your game learning another language or two, this is the right place for you.', 'Prior experience as Engineering Lead/Engineering Manager/Tech Lead for teams of 5 or more is required.', 'Prior experience in hiring software developers is required.', 'Current active software development experience. We are looking for engineering managers who are still involved in development actively and want to continue doing so.', 'Enjoy working on challenging solutions and systems.', 'Believe that building great applications is not only about delivering code that “works”, but involves thinking about reusability, maintainability, security, and performance.', 'A "Can do attitude" and a product mindset.', 'Confidence in communicating in English.', 'This position is open for both Ho Chi Minh city and Da Nang.']
Benefits: ['You will be proud of any product that has our name on it.', 'We are an engineering-focused company. Both co-founders are software engineers and led the tech teams at the most prominent e-commerce powerhouses in South East Asia.', 'We really pay attention and care about processes, high quality, and aesthetics.', 'Strong processes. We not only believe but also really work following agile principles. Developers work on well-sized and well-defined user stories, do estimates using points and work iteratively in short sprints (1-2 weeks).', 'Regular one-on-one reviews to constantly improve and grow. We have a clearly defined process for our developers to level up continuously not only their technical skills but also soft skills.', 'The vast amount of learning resources (Pluralsight, Pragpub, Leanpub, (e-)books, etc.) and yearly education allowance to step up your game.', 'Private medical insurance (Liberty) from day one, company care fund, and social welfare coverage.', 'Great equipment consisting of a MacBook Pro, large screens, and any accessory to let you work comfortably. Our equipment is renewed every 3 years.', 'Casual work attire for everyone. ', 'Comfortable and modern office space environment in the heart of HCMC or Da Nang', 'Company-wide Work-From-Home policy', 'Work From Home allowance to set up your home office the right way!', 'Our office kitchen is fully stocked with drinks and snacks for the team.', '26 days of paid leaves/year (11 public holidays + 15 personal days).', 'Sabbatical month every 3 years.', 'Company outing every year.', 'Many more perks!']

Location: 28th floor, Opal Tower, 92 Nguyen Huu Canh Street, Ward 22, Binh Thanh, Ho Chi Minh See map
Job Desription: ['As a QA Engineer at Unifiedpost Group, you will be a part of an agile development team and will be responsible for ensuring a product or service meets the established standards of quality including reliability, usability, and performance.', 'You will be also a part of a professional and competent team with deep product knowledge and work in close relationships with the Development teams, Business Analysts, Product Owners, Project Managers, and DevOps IT department to build quality products. ', 'Operational tasks ', 'Creates test cases and organizes them into test plans;', 'Prioritizes and executes manual testing using TestRail: acceptance, regression, smoke, sanity, functional testing;', 'Creates and executes automated tests in the CI (Continuous Integration pipeline using Selenium Webdriver (Ruby or Java as the programming language); ', 'Executes API testing for REST requests;', 'Designs, creates, and executes performance testing (using JMeter);', 'Executes security Testing (using ZAP);', 'Reports test results;', 'Opens bugs, documenting all the steps required to reproduce them;', 'Follows the team’s specific process;', 'Works closely with Product Owners, Business Analysts, Developers, DevOps, and Project Managers to build and deploy qualitative web applications', 'Organizational tasks', 'Follows project requirements, quality standards, and deadlines as set in the project specifications;', 'Applies work procedures, guidelines, and instructions in performing the job responsibilities and tasks;', 'Depending on the level of expertise, takes part in the technical evaluation of candidates, trains, mentors, and coaches newcomers and colleagues to ensure knowledge sharing;', 'Keeps confidentiality of all company information;', 'Takes over colleagues’ tasks and responsibilities during holidays or other leaves;', 'Follows instructions and guidelines when using company equipment and maintains them in good condition;', 'Registers the time worked in designated tools (e.g. NetSuite, Jira) and books all absences in advance following internal procedures (eg. NetSuite);', 'Provides necessary documents & certifications and fills in the required documents as per company and/or department rules and regulations (e.g. criminal record, expense report, attendance sheet);', 'Follows the Collective Labor Agreement, Unifiedpost Internal Regulations and Fire, Work Health & Safety norms and regulations;', 'Ensures proper usage of software applications installed on Unifiedpost IT equipment by applying existing rules and recommendations against software viruses.', 'Maintains software configuration and makes sure that any new software installed is licensed.']

Location: The Galleria Metro 6 Office Tower,59 Hanoi highway, District 2, Ho Chi Minh See map
Job Desription: ['ABOUT US', 'Inspectorio is a cloud-based SaaS solution focused on creating a dynamic and risk-assessment based Quality and Compliance program with the goal of generating more sustainable and transparent supply chains. Our network is a one-stop-shop platform where all key stakeholders in the production process can connect to execute, monitor, and report on Quality and Compliance activities.', 'Our products provide digitization, automation, transparency, and traceability, with a strong focus on advanced analytics & Machine Learning. This enables us to leverage customer data for predictive insights and dynamic risk-based interventions.', 'Founded in 2016, Inspectorio set out to revolutionize the supply chain industry. Today, we work with many of the world’s leading brands and retailers, and thousands of vendors and factory organizations across the globe to bring unparalleled levels of visibility, transparency, and accuracy to their quality, sustainability, and compliance initiatives!', 'JOB SUMMARY', "Inspectorio's Software Engineers are responsible for ideating and developing products that solve problems in the supply chain by architecting scalable, extensible, and highly available services. At Inspectorio, we value engineers that have high levels of curiosity, attention to detail, and are great team players.", 'As a Software Engineer, you will collaborate closely with Product Owners to consult technical approaches, QAs to maintain the quality of the product, other engineers to design technical solutions, and yourself to continuously bring improvements to the team and the product.', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Work in full functional squads to brainstorm, design, develop, deliver and maintain products.', 'Write high-quality code that other engineers can quickly catch up the idea.', 'Design data models, API specifications, communications among services.', 'Monitor and optimize applications performance.', 'Quickly react bug reports.', 'Continuously contribute ideas for improvement.']
Requirements: ['STANDARD QUALIFICATIONS', '3+ years of experience in web development.', 'Strong computer science foundation.', 'In-depth knowledge of coding standards, design patterns, refactoring skills, and unit tests.', 'Confident with Python, PHP, Java, C#, Javascript, or Go.', 'In-depth knowledge of RDBMS.', 'Practical experience in handling large databases, performance optimization.', 'Professional English communication skills.', 'Experience in Agile development.', 'PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS', 'Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience.', 'Experience in Python/Django/Flask/FastAPI.', 'Experience in Postgres and/or NoSQL like ElasticSearch, Mongo.', 'Experience in CI/CD, Google Cloud, Docker.', 'Experience in Restful API, Microservices, K8s.']
Benefits: ['OUR PRODUCTS', 'Inspectorio is a cloud-based SaaS solution focused on creating a dynamic and risk-assessment based Quality and Compliance program with the goal of generating more sustainable and transparent supply chains. Our network is a one-stop-shop platform where all key stakeholders in the production process can connect to execute, monitor, and report on Quality and Compliance activities.', 'Our products provide digitization, automation, transparency, and traceability, with a strong focus on Advanced analytics, Artificial Intelligence (AI) & Machine Learning. This enables us to leverage customer data for predictive insights and dynamic risk-based interventions.', 'OUR CUSTOMERS', 'Today, we work with many of the world’s leading brands and retailers, and thousands of vendors and factory organizations across the globe to bring unparalleled levels of visibility, transparency, and accuracy to their quality, sustainability, and compliance initiatives! ', "Our customers include Target, Kohl's, Mango, Crocs, Carter…and many more. Further details about our customers can be found on our website:", 'OUR PEOPLE & CULTURE', 'Highly diversed, global team made up of engineers, data sciences, entrepreneurs, artists and others with multidisciplinary backgrounds. ', 'International environment with open, supportive and dynamic culture where all your voices are heard and you are safe to fail. ', 'Inspiring and thoughtful leadership team', 'OUR PERKS & BENEFITS', ' Flexible Working Mode', 'Our Work From Anywhere  and Unlimited PAID Annual Leave policy will let you choose your working locations and decide how long you can take your annual leave, in order to achieve your Work-life balance the way you want it! ', 'Competitive Salary', 'At Inspectorio, we only work with the best of the best. That’s why, if we invite you to join us, it’s because we recognize your amazing skills, value, and potential. It probably wasn’t easy for you to become this awesome, so we make sure to reward you for it.', 'International Work Experience', 'We are going to take over the world.... Perhaps not quite, but we are a global company that thrives from the interactions between our different offices. Join us to work alongside Belarusians in Vietnam, Mexicans in Minsk, Filipinos in China and more.', 'Personal and Professional Growth', 'Inspectorians are our most valuable resource, so we make sure to invest heavily in them. All Inspectorians are eligible for funding to attend conferences, take courses, present their research, and more. This on top of the continuous mentoring and guidance you’ll receive guarantees you’ll grow as a professional and as a human while at Inspectorio.', 'Full Project Ownership', 'Are you an inventor? Want to start a new internship program? How about a soccer tournament? Or a whole new department within the company? Whatever it is that you want to do, we’re here to listen, and if your idea is good, we’ll give you all the resources you need to make it happen. When any Inspectorian wins, we all win.', 'Fun, Fun, Fun', 'We put our money where your smiles are. Company-sponsored trips, weekly parties, sporting events, and more. We make sure that Inspectorians enjoy coming to work by promoting as much fun as we can.', 'OUR VALUES', 'EXCELLENCE', 'We pursue mastery and craftmanship. “Good enough” is our enemy.', 'We have a thirst and desire for knowledge and continuous improvement because there’s always an opportunity to be better.', 'We always find time to help and learn from others.', 'AUTONOMY', 'We act independently when we recognize an opportunity for improvement.', 'We seek guidance, alignment, and clear goals instead of orders or hand-holding.', 'We self-assess the quality and impact of our work, identify opportunities to improve and make changes proactively.', 'COURAGE', 'We share our opinion and insights, even if it’s uncomfortable.', 'We are candid and direct with everyone we work with.', 'We are willing to experiment and try something new, even if we’re not sure it will succeed.', 'HUMBLENESS', 'We crave opportunities to learn from the people around us.', 'We focus on listening to other perspectives because we know we don’t have all the answers or best solutions.', 'We recognize that vanity and ego are the enemies of great ideas and outstanding products.']

Location: AGB Building (Floor B- 5th),14 Tan Hai, Tan Binh, Ho Chi Minh See map
Job Desription: ['YOU', 'You want to be an important member of a strong team of other makers who take pride in their work and support each other. As a Frontend Developer, you will work on building out Simpson Strong-Tie’s reusable component library in a high-quality, maintainable way; partner directly with UX Product Designers to set the future of Simpson Strong-Tie design; improve our front-end infrastructure and tooling. All of this will go toward elevating the level of product design and quality throughout the Simpson Strong-Tie web-facing product portfolio. That’s year one. If career growth is important to you, we not only know how to help you with that, it’s what we love to do: ', 'WHAT YOU’LL BE DOING', 'Help build Simpson Strong-Tie’s reusable component library into a global design system', 'Help establish a code-based style guide for our design system as well as promote and encourage its use ', 'Collaborated with multiple product teams to implement design artifacts held in Figma and similar tools into finished static resources for incorporation into Simpson Strong-Tie’s digital products ', 'Develop features and functionality that delight and engage end users using HTML, CSS/SCSS, JavaScript, and React Components ', 'Create reusable and clean UX patterns and frameworks that are unit-testable for simple or complex user tasks ', 'Participate in the design process to develop creative concepts in addition to ensuring the technical feasibility of UX designs that are compatible with multiple browsers and multiple devices ', 'Partner with other teams across the organization to weigh in on project priorities, project estimation, and risk identification for roadmap projects', 'Contribute to multiple releases across Simpson Strong-Tie’s digital product portfolio ', 'Work closely with UX Product Designers, Project Managers, and Subject Matter Experts to implement versatile, front-end solutions to web development challenges ', 'Launch, iterate, and make a difference ', 'Manage your own time as well as work well both independently and as part of a team ', 'Deliver innovative, engaging prototypes using the latest in front-end technologies ', 'Provide front-end coding expertise and help make our products better for users ', ' ']
Requirements: [' If you can do everything listed above, you’ve got what it takes. Perhaps some of the following would be helpful too:', 'At least 2 years of overall software development experience, with an emphasis on web applications and front-end technologies', 'Working experience with a modern Javascript UI framework: React, Vue, Lightning Web Components, or Angular ', 'Good English communication skills (both verbal and non-verbal)', 'Working knowledge of HTML, SCSS, and CSS ', 'Working knowledge of: ES6, ES7, ES8 ', 'Working knowledge of XHR modules such as axios or fetch ', 'Able to write clean, semantic HTML and is proficient in styling with modern techniques, such as SCSS modules ', 'Familiar with Figma, design systems, knowledge of frameworks/tooling such as atomic design principles, tokens, and semantic naming', 'Helpful if some experience with a form of SVG framework: D3, Highcharts, ReactCharts ', 'Understand and design for non-functional concerns such as performance, cost optimization, maintainability, developer experience, and responsive design ', 'Proficient with versioning software such as GIT or TFS ', 'Proficient with JIRA and Confluence ', 'Excellent organizational and communication skills ', 'Comfortable working across multiple product areas, building relationships, and connecting different workstreams into a unified system for all']
Benefits: ['  Attractive salary with 100% salary during probation', '13th-month salary, Performance bonus (1,5-2 months salary), Salary review annually', 'Premium health care program for employee + one of your beloved ones, Annual medical check-up', '15 vacation days per year', 'Opportunity to be on-site in the USA', 'Opportunity to collaborate and work directly with global stakeholders (US, EU, China, AUS..)', 'Provide training to develop our employee‘s knowledge and skills (Internal training: Udemy, Pluralsight, and other online training courses, TechTalk sharing within Software Development Division; External training: Management, English, Soft Skills, ….)', 'Benefits for special holidays (Birthday, Marriage, Women’s Day, Tet Holidays, Mid-Autumn, Newborn babies, International Children‘s Day…)', 'Company trip and Year-End party every year', 'Social, sports and several team building activities', 'Young, friendly and international working environment', 'Modern working conditions and entertainment facilities at office', 'Snacks, tea and coffee all the time', 'Compliance fully to Vietnam Labor code']

', 'Với nền văn hóa cởi mở,thân thiện, hòa đồng, sẵn sàng tương trợ, gắn kết tình đồng đội của nhân viên Senspark.', 'Gia nhập Senspark bạn sẽ được hưởng những quyền lợi tốt nhất:   ', 'Lương UPTO 3000 USD', 'Kèm bonus siêu to: Thưởng KPI, quý, lễ,thâm niên, dự án, đặt biệt thưởng Bcoin siêu hot.', 'Thưởng cuối năm theo HĐKD (năm 2020: Thưởng lên đến 6 tháng lương).', 'Hỗ trợ cơm trưa: 50.000 đ/ngày.', 'Bảo hiểm xã hội được công ty đóng 100%.', '15 ngày phép năm, được hoàn tiền phép dư.', 'Miễn phí gửi xe tại tòa nhà.', 'Các bữa tiệc hàng tháng, team building, du lịch hàng năm, cùng nhiều sự kiện thú vị khác để gắn kết nhân viên.', 'Nhiều khu giải trí dành cho bạn xả stress: Máy chơi game Ps4, Bi Lắc… hoặc thả hồn trong những khu vườn thơ mộng tại Farm Club Senspark.', 'Sẵn sàng tạo điều kiện, khai thác tiềm năng để nâng cao giá trị của mỗi nhân viên.']

Or a formerly competitive programmer.', '', ' ']
Benefits: ['We hope VNG is a place where you build your career. Whether you want to pursue to be a manager or focus on professional development, we acknowledge and appreciate your talents. Therefore, we open up to you more promotion opportunities in VNG, and designed program to help you succeed in every single career path. ', '', 'NO SUIT, NO TIE: At VNG, we do not have many rules because we respect you and want to make comfortable atmosphere to help employees perform their jobs well.', 'Company “pay” for you: Lunch, parking, swimming, learning English or gym for free and you know you are really in care.', 'NO BARRIERS: Office of VNG is an open space because we always try to remove all barriers to help members easily shares with each other.', 'Being a big family: Like a gift for family day. A party for the kids. We know how much your family matters.', 'NO RANK At VNG, members are encouraged to contribute ideas and debate with the others.', 'Be explored: Ph.D., un-academic guy, bookish girl, fashion designers ...
