Location: Tầng 19, tòa nhà Peakview Tower, 36 Hoàng Cầu, Đống Đa, Hà Nội, Dong Da, Ha Noi See map
Job Desription: ['Scandinavian Software Park gathers software engineers at some of Scandinavia’s market leading SaaS companies that develop cutting edge products for a wide variety of industries across the world. The Park is founded by Swedish Monterro, a leading growth investor in B2B software.', 'We are looking for great JavaScript developers for TimeEdit to work in our beautiful office in HANOI, VIETNAM. With TimeEdit, planning, scheduling, and managing your resources has never been easier. With our market-leading software and our world-class Customer Success Team, we help educational organizations drastically improve their resource utilization levels, class access ratios, and ultimately, student success.', 'Not all heroes wear capes', 'Most would agree that universities and colleges are quintessential to a well-functioning society. However, with their inherent operational complexity and large size, they are some of the most difficult organizations to run efficiently. This is what TimeEdit has set out to rectify. We are on a mission to deliver the most comprehensive suite of resource management tools for the higher education sector. We are currently the fastest growing provider in the industry and are expanding our organization at a rapid pace.', 'With the market transitioning away from legacy monolites, Excel spreadsheets and home-grown has-beens, the TimeEdit Engineering team plays a pivotal role in defining the next generation of resource management tools for universities across the globe. To accelerate our growth journey, we are looking for another set of capable engineering hands to join our team and develop the EdTech applications of tomorrow.', 'More information:', ' ']
Requirements: ['As Senior JavaScript Engineer you will be responsible for:', 'You will join the Engineering function in one of our cross-functional product teams, working closely with your fellow team members, your Engineering Manager and a Product Manager. Your JavaScript skills will be honed as you take on new exciting sprints together with the team, and you will be part of shaping the roadmap as you contribute to the product requirements and tech specifications of the upcoming sprints.', 'What do you need to succeed in this\u202frole?', 'At a minimum, you should have a bachelor’s degree in Software Development or equivalent', 'Have solid understanding of the full software development life cycle', '5+ years of software development experience', '3+ years of JavaScript experience', '2+ years of React and / or NodeJS experience', 'Experience with Google Cloud Platform, CircleCI, MongoDB is helpful, but not required', 'Great communication skills; fluent in English, verbal and written']
Benefits: ['You will be:', 'Develop and plan some of the most critical and exciting EdTech projects', 'Help shape the engineering culture, practices and policies at TimeEdit', 'Be part of a larger Engineering team delivering cutting edge EdTech SaaS solutions to ~600 000 daily users', 'Together with the leadership team help grow TimeEdit into a global market leader in the RMS space, including the addition of multiple new products, acquisitions, localization and support for new integrations', 'Living on our Scandinavian culture and office while working in Agile environment that has strong team spirit, openness, unceasing creativity and innovation.', 'You’ll get', 'Sign-on-bonus if the labor contract has been signed before 31/12/2021', 'To work with experienced software engineers worldwide at market leading, innovative Scandinavian SaaS company looking to accelerate growth', 'Scandinavian Work Culture: creativity, innovation and work-life balance', 'Competitive salary and 100% official salary during the probation period.', 'Annual review and 13th month salary.', 'Premium healthcare and & accident insurance.', 'Wellness package supports employees stay healthy and wealthy.', 'Exciting company outing/events and team building activities.', 'On-site and training opportunities in Nordic.', 'Modern working environment.']

Location: Tầng 19, tòa nhà Peakview Tower, 36 Hoàng Cầu, Đống Đa, Hà Nội, Dong Da, Ha Noi See map
Job Desription: ['Scandinavian Software Park gathers software engineers at some of Scandinavia’s market leading SaaS companies that develop cutting edge products for a wide variety of industries across the world. The Park is founded by Swedish Monterro, a leading growth investor in B2B software.', 'We are looking for Quality Assurance Engineer who is enthusiastic and passionate about testing and finding innovative ways to speed up the test cycles for Viedoc Technologies to work in our beautiful office in HANOI, VIETNAM.', 'Viedoc Technologies develops and markets software solutions for clinical trials and patient registries as SaaS (Software as a Service). The product Viedoc is a modern and future-proof electronic data capture platform that allows clinical trial sponsors and study sites to easily and securely collect, validate, transmit and analyze clinical study data. Viedoc has been used in more than 1.000 clinical studies in 75 countries with more than 400.000 patients worldwide. The goal for organizations using Viedoc (mainly Contract Research Organisations (CRO), pharma, biotech, medtech and consumer health) is to produce health products in a more time and cost-efficient manner.', 'More information:', 'Responsibilities:', 'Analyze and test software to ensure that products meet design specifications and are within total quality management limits and standards', 'Write, maintain, and execute manual tests', 'Isolate, replicate, and report bugs and verify bug fixes', 'Participate actively in the entire system development life cycle', 'Communicate with product developers and technical support specialists on software issues', 'Contribute to requirement analysis from a testability point of view']
Requirements: ['You are self-motivated and passionate about delivering high quality software', 'You have an appreciation for both manual and automated testing', 'You have an immense attention to detail', 'You are pretty good at understanding complex business concepts', '3+ years of relevant QA technical experience', 'Experience in testing web applications and APIs', 'Automated testing experience with Selenium WebDriver', 'You can multitask and deal with uncertainty, evolving requirements and time pressures', 'You don’t always resort to the tried and tested – you embrace change and find innovative solutions to problems', 'You have willingness to learn and self-improve', 'You have a good understanding of agile development', 'You enjoy working in a friendly, collaborative, fast paced team', 'Since the office language is English, you must be accustomed to speaking and writing in English']
Benefits: ['You will be:', 'Studying business and developing the SaaS platform on Medical Technologies (MedTech).', 'Working agile and being part of one of our development teams across countries and also enjoying a generous working environment with reliable, non-prestigious and humble colleagues who respect customers, each other, and decisions by being responsive, well prepared and punctual.', 'Long-term developing your career path on the edge of Microsoft tech stack and related technologies, especially Azure cloud.', 'Living on our Scandinavian culture and office while working in Agile environment that has strong team spirit, openness, unceasing creativity and innovation.', 'You’ll get', 'To work with experienced software engineers worldwide at market leading, innovative Scandinavian SaaS company looking to accelerate growth', 'Scandinavian Work Culture: creativity, innovation and work-life balance', 'Competitive salary and 100% official salary during the probation period.', 'Annual review and 13th month salary.', 'Premium healthcare and & accident insurance.', 'Wellness package supports employees stay healthy and wealthy.', 'Exciting company outing/events and team building activities.', 'On-site and training opportunities in Nordic.', 'Modern working environment.']

You can hang paintings, plant trees, even feed aquarium on the desk.', 'Be showed your best: VNGers like to "mortification" with the group games such as: Fansipan climbing, waterfall rafting, go over heat mats; there activities not only are tightening friendship, but also practice their bravery.', 'GAMING: Even if you do not make the game, stealing beans in the boss’s garden or versusing with your colleagues in a sword competition play online is also an interesting way to relax.', '', 'Changing the world: Creating an entertainment channel, building a social network and developing a game. On the Internet world, every single thing you did can change the lives of many people.', '', "Let’s join VNG to share our mission: 'MAKE THE INTERNET CHANGE VIETNAMESE LIVES'"]

Location: Viettel Tower, 285 CMT8, District 10, Ho Chi Minh See map
Job Desription: ['NVG and Swiss Marketplace Group (No.1 digital marketplace network in Switzerland) are looking for a talented a Senior Android Engineer with outstanding native Android development skills, strong agile experience, and incredible leadership qualities to join our teams.', 'As a Senior Android Engineer, you’ll drive new innovations and make your impact on the products. You’ll bring your Android experience and technical expertise to the products and share with the team.', 'Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve our mobile products', 'Daily teamwork with the Swiss and the local team members', 'Manage individual project priorities, deadlines and deliverables', 'Build robust and scalable Android components using the latest tools in the Android ecosystem.', 'Collaborate with cross-functional teams, e.g. Product Managers and Designers', 'Make users happy!']
Requirements: ['Strong English written and verbal skills is a MUST.', 'At least 3 years experience in native Android development, with deep knowledge of the Android core framework and Kotlin/Java language', 'Good understanding of modern Android application architecture such as Clean architecture, MVVM, modularization', 'Good knowledge and experience with SOLID principles', 'Experience in using Kotlin Coroutines and 3rd party libraries like Dagger, Retrofit, RxJava, ...', 'Good development experience with all layers of an Android application: network, database, model, business logics and views', 'Experience in developing high performance client-server mobile applications: fast and highly responsive', 'Good understanding of Android User Interface guidelines, care for mobile usability', 'Strong quality mindset and practice with unit testing', 'Good knowledge in the build, deployment, and release of mobile applications and CI/CD tools (Gradle, FastLane/Jenkins/Git)', 'Evaluate new mobile methodologies and technologies', 'NICE TO HAVE', 'Experience in backend technologies as well as Microservices, RESTful JSON APIs', 'Have experience in memory & performance solving']

Location: Tầng 19, tòa nhà Peakview Tower, 36 Hoàng Cầu, Đống Đa, Hà Nội, Dong Da, Ha Noi See map
Job Desription: ['Lumera is looking for experienced software developers to help us build our new Kubernetes-based system management application and be a part of building our new team at the Scandinavian Software Park in Hanoi, Vietnam. Are you down with Kotlin, Kubernetes and such? Are you looking for complex problem-solving and team collaboration? Join us!', 'Lumera is a software company that develops a business system for the Life and Pensions industry. We’re the market leader in the Nordics and we’re expanding into Europe. Our team of 250 in Sweden and Norway is growing as we add more talented, engaged, and exceptional people. We are all waiting for you!', 'More information:', 'What will you do?', 'You will be a part of our new team in Hanoi, working closely with the team in Stockholm (tech lead and product owner). Together you will continue building our internal tool for efficiently setting up new test environments for our core product. The tool was developed to support a technical paradigm shift at Lumera and is highly sought after as it is still in beta version. Our vision is to create a cutting-edge system management platform that enables everyone to use cloud native technologies, without the need for a technical background. That currently includes everyone at Lumera, but the future may include our customers as well.', 'Responsibilities', 'Building and maintaining our system management application', 'Write well-designed, testable, efficient code by using development best practices', 'Integrate data from various back-end services and databases', 'Collaborating with other team members to establish objectives and design more functional, cohesive code to enhance the user experience.', 'Work with stakeholders to gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs', 'Create and maintain software documentation', 'QA testing', 'Troubleshooting and debugging']
Requirements: ['Bachelor’s degree in computer programming, computer science, or a related field', 'Great oral and written communication in English', 'Self-motivated individual who can plan his own work when needed', 'Strong understanding of the agile development cycle and programming techniques and tools', 'Professionals should be skilled in:', 'Kotlin', 'Kubernetes', 'Linux', 'It is beneficial to also be experienced in:', 'Python', 'Java', 'Docker', 'SQL', 'Computer networks', 'Public cloud environments (AWS, Azure, etc.)', 'Typescript', 'Vue.js', 'Git']
Benefits: ['What do we offer you?', 'Developing software as services for insurTech domain in a leading company.', 'Challenging and fun work at a product company with a complex and socially important product.', 'With us, you get the opportunity to work agile in complex projects that provide good conditions for both your and our development. We organize “Innovation Days” and “Open Space” where you get the opportunity to work with your own creative development projects.', 'Development opportunities internally: with us, you get the chance to develop, grow and take responsibility early. Also competence development through Lumera Academy.', 'Well-being employees in focus: feel free to ask us about our benefits package!', 'Helpful colleagues who always stand up for each other.', 'Be part of a company that is now gearing up and investing internationally.', 'Living on our Scandinavian culture and office while working in Agile environment that has strong team spirit, openness, unceasing creativity and innovation.', 'What will you get?', 'You’ll get to work with experienced software engineers worldwide at market leading, innovative Scandinavian SaaS company looking to accelerate growth', 'Scandinavian Work Culture: creativity, innovation and work-life balance', 'Competitive salary and 100% official salary during the probation period.', 'Annual review and 13th month salary.', 'Premium healthcare and & accident insurance.', 'Wellness package supports employees stay healthy and wealthy.', 'Exciting company outing/events and team building activities.', 'On-site and training opportunities in Nordic.', 'Modern working environment.']

Location: 12 Khuat Duy Tien, Thanh Xuan, Ha Noi See map
Job Desription: ['Tiếp nhận yêu cầu từ khách hàng, sau đó phân tích yêu cầu;', 'Thiết kế phần mềm iOS app sau đó thực hiện lập trình, unit test;', 'Quản lý tiến độ công việc của bản thân và của thành viên phát triển app Android;', 'Họp với khách hàng hàng tuần để báo cáo tiến độ.', 'Tìm kiếm, xây dựng và mở rộng các mối quan hệ để tiếp cận khách hàng mới là công ty, cơ quan tổ chức nhà nước;', 'Tham gia vào phát triển sản phẩm của công ty;']
Requirements: ['Có kinh nghiệm phát triển app iOS từ 3 năm kinh nghiệm trở lên hoặc trực tiếp phát triển ít nhất 4 iOS app. Các ứng viên đã làm nhiều dự án soutsource với khách hàng Nhật sẽ có lợi thế lớn.', 'Có nền tảng tốt về lập trình hướng đối tượng, cấu trúc dữ liệu giải thuật, tư duy logic.', 'Có kĩ năng cao trong việc debug, phân tích lỗi', 'Có khả năng đọc hiểu source code có sẵn, source code lớn, phức tạp và tiếp tục cải tiến, bảo trì, nâng cấp…', 'Có kỹ năng phân tích yêu cầu, thiết kế, quản lý tiến độ, giải quyết vấn đề.', 'Tỉ mỉ, cần cù, chăm chỉ.', 'Ưu tiên có khả năng phát triển cả app Android.']
Benefits: ['Mức thu nhập xứng đáng với năng lực và hết sức cạnh tranh so với các công ty khác, Thu nhập cao hơn mức chung của thị trường 20% => 50%;', 'Được cung cấp các trang thiết bị khi làm việc tại công ty.', 'Làm việc 5 ngày một tuần (nghỉ thứ 7 và chủ nhật) và nghỉ các ngày nghỉ lễ khác theo quy định của nhà nước.', 'Được hưởng bảo hiểm xã hội, bảo hiểm y tế theo chế độ nhà nước ban hành.', 'Được làm việc trong môi trường năng động, chuyên nghiệp theo những tiêu chuẩn từ các đối tác Nhật Bản, châu Âu, Singapore.', 'Được làm việc trong môi trường năng động, chuyên nghiệp, sáng tạo, trẻ trung với những nhân tố 8x, 9x đầy năng lượng và luôn tràn đầy tinh thần startup;', 'Chế độ nghỉ mát hàng năm', 'Review tăng lương hàng năm.', '# Cơ hội phát triển nghề nghiệp', 'Làm việc, học hỏi và phát triển cùng đồng nghiệp là những kỹ sư tài năng, giàu kinh nghiệm.', 'Cơ hội làm việc với khách nước ngoài, nâng cao kỹ năng, tác phong làm việc.', 'Có nhiều cơ hội trở thành key person của công ty.', 'Được tạo điều kiện tham gia các khóa học về kỹ thuật, công nghệ mới', '# Chế độ đãi ngộ', 'Thưởng hàng năm lên tới 02 tháng lương', 'Xét tăng lương 1 lần/năm', 'Được hưởng bảo hiểm xã hội, bảo hiểm y tế theo chế độ nhà nước ban hành.', 'Nghỉ 12 ngày phép/năm', 'Làm việc từ thứ Hai – Sáu, 8 tiếng/ngày', 'Du lịch, sumup hàng năm', '# Đời sống tinh thần', 'Thời gian làm việc từ 8:00 đến 17:00', 'Miễn phí trà cà phê', 'Du lịch công ty, sum up hàng năm', 'Party liên miên  quốc tế phụ nữ, trung thu, giáng sinh, năm mới...', 'Môi trường siêu thân thiện và thoải mái.', ' # Tiện ích hiện đại, đầy đủ', 'Phòng họp siêu to, rộng', ' ']

Location: Tòa nhà TNR, 54A Nguyễn Chí Thanh, Dong Da, Ha Noi See map
Job Desription: ['Vị trí này thuộc Chương trình tuyển dụng D-Innovation của Ngân hàng TMCP Hàng Hải Việt Nam. Đây là chương trình tuyển dụng mảng Công nghệ thông tin và Khoa học máy tính lớn nhất của MSB từ trước tới nay. Mục tiêu cao nhất của Chương trình là nhằm tìm kiếm và tạo cơ hội thể hiện năng lực cho các Kỹ sư Công nghệ có kinh nghiệm, từ đó triển khai thành công các Siêu dự án trong tổ hợp công nghệ cao của MSB (gồm các dự án Công nghệ lớn/nhỏ và Khối Công nghệ MSB).', 'Triển khai các tính năng của sản phẩm đáp ứng các yêu cầu chức năng và phi chức năng đúng với tiến dộ và đảm bảo chất luợng.', 'Phụ trách phát triển full stack backend', 'Ðảm bảo sử dụng các huớng dẫn code dể viết code hiệu quả và có thể bảo trì', 'Thực hiện kiểm thử đơn vị đối với các đoạn code đã phát triển, xác định các vấn dề và triển khai các giải pháp để giải quyết các vấn đề', 'Kiểm tra xem các tiêu chí nghiệm thu và định nghĩa hoàn thành đã được đáp ứng sau khi hoàn thành công việc trên backlog', 'Sử dụng các nền tảng phát triển, quản lý mã nguồn và các công cụ kiểm thử đơn vị để xây dựng và quản lý các tính năng của sản phẩm', 'Tương tác với nguời dùng và PO thuờng xuyên để làm rõ các yêu cầu từ đó cải tiến sản phẩm']
Requirements: ['Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin, Công nghệ phần mềm, Khoa học máy tính hoặc tương đương;', 'Sử dụng thành thạo các công cụ lập phiên bản code', 'Có khả năng lập trình Java hoặc ngôn ngữ tương đương (C#, Python…)', 'Có kiến thức về phương pháp luận phát triển vòng đời hệ thống toàn diện (end-to-end)', 'Có từ 2 năm kinh nghiệm phát triển phần mềm, có kinh nghiệm triển khai hệ thống trên nền tảng cloud là một lợi thế.', 'Có chuyên môn về ngân hàng hoặc thiết bị di dộng là một lợi thế']
Benefits: ['Tham gia những siêu dự án với vốn đầu tư 2000 tỉ đồng, ứng dụng những công nghệ mới nhất.', 'Được dẫn dắt bởi đội ngũ quản lý giỏi chuyên môn, đánh giá công bằng. Cơ hội làm việc trực tiếp với các đối tác hàng đầu thế giới (AWS; BCG; IBM; Temenos…).', 'Gói thu nhập từ 15 đến 18 tháng lương/năm (có thưởng dự án tùy vị trí công việc). Nhận mức offer cạnh tranh nếu có năng lực vượt trội.', 'Được vay vốn ngân hàng lãi suất thấp, mua cổ phiếu giá ưu đãi theo chương trình dành cho người nội bộ. Location: TTC Building, Số 1, Đường Tân Thuận, P. Tân Thuận Đông, District 7, Ho Chi Minh See map
Job Desription: ['Hi talent candidates,', 'Bein is a community platform, applies blockchain technology. A place for those who value meaningful engagement and build their own community. No forced ads, no data control. You are responsible for your digital footprints.', 'The team behind Bein is not some random startup guys, though. We have a solid background from academic to real business. Some members came from big popular brands name in Vietnam and worldwide. You can find out more about us at join.bein.global. ', 'To expand the team and speed up our project, we are looking for JavaScript Developers from a wide range of levels (junior/mid-level/senior) and roles (front end/mobile app/backend).', 'In this post, we focus on Backend Developer. If you have a strong background with Javascript, from other fields, please check other posts at our sites (join.bein.global) or on our itviec company profile page.', 'Working with us, you will:', 'Work as part of a product team to develop a solid backend for web and mobile applications, and build out critical features on existing applications.', 'Co-operate with other frontend and backend teams to smoothly integrate the whole system.', 'Involve in a full cycle from planning, analyzing, estimating to continuously delivering high-quality work to end-users.', 'Have a great chance to learn from building a product, both technology and business perspectives.', 'Salary: up to $3500 Gross (or even more based on your qualification).', 'Crypto Token option/reward to share product success with all members.', 'Roles and Positions to apply:', 'We welcome any level from Junior to Expert for the following positions:', 'ReactJS', 'React Native', 'NodeJS Backend', 'Technical Leaders']
Requirements: ['We are using:', 'React Native for mobile app.', 'ReactJS for webapp.', 'NextJS for server-side rendering', 'NestJS for the backend.', 'Sequelize for ORM.', 'PostgreSQL and MongoDB for database.', 'Redis for caching.', 'ElasticSearch for searching.', 'RabbitMQ for message broker.', 'Jest for unit testing and Katalon, Cypress, and Detox for automation testing.', 'K8s for DevOps.', 'Git for version control.', 'Scrum for development.', 'And more.', 'To join us, you will need:', 'You should feel comfortable with some technologies in the stack (depending on your position backend/frontend/mobile)', 'You can come from a similar technology (e.g. you know AngularJS instead of ReactJS), and be ready to learn a new one.', 'At least 1 year of experience with one of our main technologies, i.e. NodeJS/ ReactJS/ React Native or a similar framework.', 'For the Team Leader position, you must have a strong background in design and make the right decisions for customers and the team and help your team members grow up.', 'You can be a member who readies to go deep and focus on some specified narrow fields/technologies, OR willing to go wide and quickly adapt to a new one if necessary. We welcome both.']
Benefits: ['Competitive salary:', '- Based on your work result ', '- Normally, 2 times review per year.', '- 100% salary during the probation period.', '- Up to 14th-month salary', '- Sign-in bonus & performance bonus when applicable.', '  Flexible time: based on your own need; stand up around 10 a.m. to avoid traffic jams.', 'Flexible Location: You can work at Office or Remote from your home or Hybrid.', 'Many days off: You will have 16+ full-paid days off per year.', '- 1 additional annual leave day for each 2 working years', '  For developers, choose your own weapon:', '- Device budget ', '- External 24" IPS FullHD Monitor.', '  Sharpen your knowledge: entire task-free day to do whatever you like and online courses sponsor.', 'Lots of chances to grow: As the product grows up, there will have many roles for you to challenge, from tech to business sides.', 'Spacious, well-equipped, and friendly office: New office with different working style areas.', 'Annual vacation: with other team members or take the full-paid days off for yourself.', 'Extra Health insurance: Private premium package for you and.', 'Free food and Drink: Coffee, tea & soft drinks, and healthy snacks all day long', '  Parking fees paid', 'Relax room with entertainment & amenities (TV, books, Game consoles)', 'Annual company trip', 'Football, badminton club…', 'Last but not least, Token option and Token reward to share product success with all members.']

Requirements: ['General requirements:', 'At least an intermediate skill level of English', 'Likely having 2+ years of experience in software testing.', 'Solid testing experiences (test strategy, test approach, test plan, test techniques included black box, risk-based, exploratory, Non-UI testing, etc.)', 'Good knowledge of the software development process, especially the software testing process', 'Methodical and detail-oriented, with solid analytical skills and problem-solving ability', 'Based on your competencies and potentials, you can apply one of these positions:', '(1) (Junior/Senior/Lead) Manual Test Engineer:', 'Good experience in manual testing for web-based and standalone applications', 'Experience with cross-browser, cross-platform and responsive testing (PC, mobile and tablet)', '(2) (Junior/Senior) Full-stack Test Engineer :', 'Strong experiences on manual testing ', 'Experience on Automation testing, API testing', 'Research/ Experience on using technologies and frameworks: Selenium WebDriver, TestNG, JUnit…', '(3) (Junior/Senior) Automation Test Engineer:', 'Experience on Automate functional, regression and/or performance acceptance tests...', 'Experience in creating and running automated tests on a web/mobile app using app testing frameworks like Selenium/Appium/XCTest/ XCUiTest', 'Hand-on experience in using test tools like TestNG/ Jasmine/ Mocha/ Protractor/ caWebdriverIO etc.']

Benefits: ['Working time: Monday - Friday. Location: Tầng 5, 222 Điện Biên Phủ, Phường Võ Thị Sáu, Quận 3, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, District 3, Ho Chi Minh See map
Job Desription: ['Summary:', 'Our client is a multinational big data analytics company. They offer a Customer Data Platform (CDP) that unifies customer data from disparate sources to deliver a holistic view of the customer enabling insights and actions with the objective of optimizing personalized customer journeys. They have differentiated technologies to ingest and unify customer data, perform machine learning on customer data and syndicate with other software products for activation. They have numerous large global customers, like Subaru, Panasonic, LG and Canon who trust them to handle their complexity, scale, and security needs.', 'Our Vietnam team has around 15+ engineers who are software engineers, quality engineers and product managers. We are taking care multiple parts of the platform.', 'Thing you will do:', 'Implementation of software quality assurance in support of Treasure Data’s products.', 'Write test cases to verify new features.', 'Documentation, testing, and maintenance.', 'Assist in establishing software test standards & methods.', 'Conduct manual software testing.', 'Help automate testing of the features manually verifiedGather product feedback and help drive specifications for our Integration Studio.']
Requirements: ['Strong communication (written and oral), analytical, organizational, interpersonal skills and attention to detail.', 'Self-starter who is results-oriented and exhibits responsibility and intellectual curiosity.', 'Ability to work independently or with a team and communicate effectively.', 'Critical: independent thinking and timely follow up.', 'Familiarity with SQL.', 'Eagerness to learn and get hands-on with the latest technologies.', 'Comfortable working with Mac OS or Windows.', 'Experience in JIRA or similar bug tracking tool.', 'Familiar with Linux.', 'Knowledge of version control applications like Github.', 'Knowledge of Quality Assurance processes.', 'Experience verifying Front-end applications.', 'Experience automating testing of Frontend applications.', 'Familiarity with Javascript is nice to have.', 'High-level early product concepts.']
Benefits: ['What You Get:', 'Competitive salary and benefits: we seek the best talent for this role as you will be the interface between product and engineering.', 'Innovation: Our business is at the frontier of enterprise technology adoption. You have an opportunity to learn about a whole suite of technology that is changing how the world’s largest institutions run their core businesses.', 'What We Value: ', 'Humility: Know what you do not know, be candid about it, seek help and guidance -- both from customers and colleagues.', 'Gumption: Some call it “distance travelled”, i.e., how far you have come in your life overcoming obstacles, putting in sustained effort, defying the odds. We love optimistic doers.', 'High cognitive skills & adaptive learning skills: We value people who can learn actively from the environment and constantly tweak their approach. Success comes from million such tweaks.', 'Technical breadth and depth: You will not program actively for this role.  However, you do have to develop a strong technical understanding of our platform and adjacent products.']

Location: Copac Square Building, 12 Tôn Đản, phường 13, District 4, Ho Chi Minh See map
Job Desription: ['Global Fashion Group (GFG) is the leading fashion and lifestyle retail destination in Asia Pacific, Latin America and CIS. We connect over 10,000 global, local and own brands to a market of more than one billion consumers through four established e-commerce platforms: THE ICONIC, ZALORA, dafiti and lamoda. Through an inspiring and seamless customer experience enabled by our own technology ecosystem and operational infrastructure, we are dedicated to being the #1 fashion and lifestyle destination in our markets. With 17 offices and 10 fulfilment centres across four continents, GFG proudly employs a dynamic and diverse team with deep local knowledge and expertise. In 2019, GFG delivered more than 34 million orders to over 13 million Active Customers.', 'At GFG, Technology is core to long-term success and is a crucial enabler of a great Customer Experience. We’re a mix of experts in fashion, logistics, data analytics, marketing, and design, guided by business consultants and tech geniuses – everyone contributes to the success of GFG.', 'If this sounds like your kind of gig, be part of a creative, passionate and dynamic team that works hard but throws a great party as well!', 'We are looking for a Software Engineer to join our team in Vietnam:', 'ABOUT THE ROLE', 'Design and build high performance, scalable and testable components for our shop platform.', 'Lead the development of new features for the shop, delivering to our standard, on time.', 'Provide material feedback to junior team members.', 'Investigate cutting edge technologies to improve site reliability, developer experience, customer experience, and raw performance.', 'Think outside the day-to-day and propose ways to elevate the art of e-commerce engineering.']
Requirements: ['BS/MS in Computer Science or related technical discipline.', '2+ years of experience with high-traffic distributed systems.', 'Solid computer science fundamentals.', 'Familiar with a high-level programming language.', 'Familiar with a testing framework.', 'Experience with SQL and relational databases.']
Benefits: ['The unique opportunity to have a serious impact on a growing organisation.', 'A dynamic working environment shaping the face of fashion e-commerce in growth markets.', 'Significant career growth opportunities in a fast-growing business, gain working exposure in the 20+ countries across the group.', 'Work closely with a global talent pool with international mindset.', 'Annual Leave: 15 days.', '13th month salary.', 'Annual bonus: up to 3 months based salary (depends on company performance).', 'Medical benefits: Social insurance, medical insurance & AON insurance.', 'Macbook Pro is provided.', 'Support for English class.', 'Support Gym membership.', 'Additionally, we offer a flat hierarchy, a fun and flexible work environment.']

Location: Copac Square Building, 12 Tôn Đản, phường 13, District 4, Ho Chi Minh See map
Job Desription: ['ABOUT THE DATA TEAM', 'Our vision to bring affordable and sustainable fashion to customers in our markets is powered by technology and data. The GFG Data Team is an integral part of GFG and is essential to enabling a data-driven decision-making culture. You will work across various departments ranging from Category Management (Buying & Planning), Finance, Customer Service, Marketing to Fulfilment delivering unique insights about our business, customers, and marketplace. It is an exciting place to be with opportunities for professional growth and the ability to work in an international team. You’ll be reporting into the Head of Business Intelligence and work with counterparts in Singapore and Vietnam.', 'ABOUT THE ROLE ', 'As a Senior Data Analyst, you will apply your passion for Data Analysis to play across the spectrum of data engineering, data science and translation of insights to English. You create relevant data models, cultivate, and cleanse data and use data analytics platforms to present meaningful dashboards and insights to the business. ', 'THE IMPACT YOU’LL MAKE', 'In this role you will:', 'Work closely with business areas to translate business strategy / goals into data-based deliverables through the development of data models that generate relevant insights .', 'Partner with the business to plan data projects / requests.   ', 'Define the approach to extract and manipulate large volumes of data using database / datawarehouse and cloud technologies, develop ELT processes where relevant.', 'Source, collate, manipulate, and interrogate datasets from disparate sources to ensure validity, accuracy, and completeness using programming languages as required.', 'Use platforms (Tableau, AWS QuickSight, Google Data Studio, Power BI) for analytics and visualisation.', 'Develop dashboards and insights reports for the business.', 'Clearly convey findings / recommendations to stakeholders.  ', 'Run periodic and ad-hoc reporting as planned.']
Requirements: ['WHAT WILL YOU BRING TO THE TEAM', 'You will have experience producing data insight presentations and reports, managing analytics projects, and extracting data from various sources. You have built your expertise in data mining, data analytics and statistical modelling that include proficiency in programming languages (Python, R) and BI platforms (Tableau, AWS QuickSight, Google Data Studio, Power BI) as well as database and datawarehouse technologies and cloud technologies to an expert level. Your ability to work with a range of technical and non-technical stakeholders to projects to specification in the agreed timeframes will help us provide a seamless customer experience to the business. ', 'EXPERIENCE AND MINDSET TO SUCCEED IN THIS ROLE REQUIRES', 'BS/MS in Computer Science or related technical discipline', '4+ years proficiency in any of the following programming languages: Python, R', '4+ years of proficiency in any of the following BI platforms: Tableau, AWS QuickSight, Google Data Studio, Power BI', '4+ years of Experience with database and datawarehouse technologies', 'Demonstrable knowledge and experience in data mining, data analytics and statistical modelling of large data sets', 'Experience with AWS or GCP cloud technologies', 'Strong presentation and visualisation skills', 'Business acumen to turn data into insight that are relevant', 'Strong organisational skills resulting in effective delivery to deadlines ', 'Good written and oral communication skills in English', '4+ years   stakeholder management ']
Benefits: ['Annual Leave: 15 days', '13th month salary', 'Annual bonus: up to 3 months based salary (depends on company performance)', 'Medical benefits: Social insurance, medical insurance & AON insurance', 'Macbook Pro is provided', 'Support for English class', 'Support Gym membership', 'Additionally, we offer a flat hierarchy, a fun and flexible work environment.']

Location: H3 Building, 1st Floor, 384 Hoang Dieu, District 6, District 4, Ho Chi Minh See map
Job Desription: ['GuardRails is looking for highly experienced full-time Backend Engineers to develop features and improvements for our backend services in a secure, well-tested and performant way. GuardRails is supporting a growing number of users from all over the world and you will play an important role in ensuring that we ship high-quality products.', 'About You', 'You are a top-notch engineer and love solving complex technical problems in a beautiful and practical way.', 'You will continuously contribute to our platform and ensure that our backend services and scanning infrastructure are fast, reliable and scalable. You will be developing ambitious features and functionality in line with our product roadmap. You welcome the opportunity to break up existing Node.js services into smaller, faster and well designed Golang microservices. You are opinionated about how Internet scale backends are engineered and happy to have constructive conversations with the team on how to continuously improve our platform. You will work together with product managers, designers, and frontend engineers towards aligned goals.', 'You are a highly motivated, experienced, and organized engineer who takes pride in the work you do. You are happy to work in a startup environment and wear all the hats that you need to in order to get things done.']
Requirements: ['You have at least 4 years of relevant and recent experience in Golang', 'You have been a high achieving software engineer for over 8 years', 'You are an expert at writing maintainable, well tested, performant and secure code.', 'You have designed countless database designs, containerization and deployment best practices. ', 'You are equally excited about building consumer-facing REST APIs as internal command line tools or services.', 'You are self-motivated, organized, creative, respectful, with a high level of integrity and ethics.', 'You have worked in remote organizations.', 'You have a strong command of the English language.', 'You Pretty Much Have the Job If', 'You have been a core contributor in an Internet scale startup and were a successful and sought after backend engineer.', 'How You’ll Make an Impact', 'Improve the performance and architecture of our backend services.', 'Improve the way we store and access data.', 'Translate requirements into well implemented and architected features and functionality.']
Benefits: ['Fully Remote Organization, with flexible work hours, we are outcome-focused.', 'High impact environment, ability to make a difference. You are not just a number.', 'Employee Stock Option Program.', 'Mac laptop and external monitor.', 'Remote-friendly tool allowance.', 'Health insurance.', 'Gym allowance, Internet allowance, Educational allowance.', 'More About GuardRails', 'GuardRails, an end-to-end application security platform, empowers modern development teams to uncover critical vulnerabilities in their applications and rectify them before attackers abuse them.', 'Software is transforming the world, and we’re ensuring that businesses can make that change securely. Join our engineering team and help us deliver security to development teams globally.', 'Join a fast-growing cybersecurity company with an experienced founding team, flagship clients who love us, and technology that is quickly becoming the go-to choice for development and security teams.']
